title: Customer Service Manager - Pet Supplies Subscription Business
description:
ABOUT ALL ANGLES CREATURES

We are a rapidly growing live feeder insect subscription company serving reptile and exotic pet owners across the United States. We ship hundreds of boxes weekly to subscribers nationwide and have experienced significant growth in our first year.

Our customers aren‚Äôt just buying bugs - they‚Äôre caring for pets they‚Äôll have for 10-20+ years. That means each customer relationship can span decades. Our entire business model depends on keeping customers happy, engaged, and subscribed for years.

We operate under the philosophy ‚ÄúExotics Without Ego‚Äù - serving the reptile community authentically without pretension.



THE ROLE

We need a Customer Service Manager who understands that in a subscription business, customer retention is everything. You‚Äôll be responsible for building, training, and managing a small customer service team (2-4 people) that protects our most valuable asset: our subscriber base.

This is NOT a job where you just process tickets and check boxes. This is a leadership role where you‚Äôll be measured on whether customers stay with us or leave us.

Your primary responsibility: Make sure every customer interaction either maintains or strengthens the relationship - never damages it.



WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO

Team Leadership:

 ? Hire, train, and manage 2-4 customer service representatives

 ? Establish quality standards and hold your team accountable to them

 ? Review team performance daily and provide real-time coaching

 ? Make difficult decisions including firing underperformers when necessary

 ? Coach in real-time when you see responses that miss the mark

Customer Retention:

 ? Ensure every customer complaint is handled in a way that de-escalates frustration

 ? Monitor retention metrics and identify patterns in customer churn

 ? Have authority to make decisions that solve problems quickly (refunds, credits, replacements)

 ? Understand that protecting customer relationships is protecting revenue

Operations & Systems:

 ? Create and maintain standardized response templates (macros) for common issues

 ? Manage customer service platforms (Shopify,
, potentially Gorgias or similar)

 ? Track key metrics: response time, resolution time, customer satisfaction, retention impact

 ? Identify operational issues that cause customer complaints and escalate them

 ? Operate independently without requiring daily direction

Communication:

 ? Provide daily updates on critical customer issues

 ? Weekly reporting on team performance and retention metrics

 ? Be direct and honest when things aren‚Äôt working - no excuses, just solutions

 ? Handle direct feedback without becoming defensive



WHAT WE‚ÄôRE LOOKING FOR

Non-Negotiable Requirements:

 ? 3+ years managing remote customer service teams (we need proven leadership, not someone learning on the job)

 ? E-commerce experience required (Shopify experience strongly preferred)

 ? Subscription business experience (you must understand retention economics)

 ? Excellent written English (native or near-native level - our customers need to feel heard and understood)

 ? Experience handling angry/frustrated customers (you know how to de-escalate, not inflame)

 ? Proven ability to hire and fire (you must have actually terminated underperformers)

Personality & Approach:

 ? Direct and honest - no sugarcoating, no excuses, just facts and solutions

 ? Accountable - you own results, not explanations for why results didn‚Äôt happen

 ? Decisive - you can make tough calls (including firing people) without hesitation

 ? Customer-obsessed - you understand that unhappy customers destroy subscription businesses

 ? Coachable - you can take direct feedback and adjust immediately

 ? Comfortable with confrontation - you don‚Äôt avoid difficult conversations

 ? Results-oriented - you care about outcomes, not just being busy

Bonus Points:

 ? Experience with live animal or perishable product shipping

 ? Background in communities/forums (Reddit,
 groups, etc.)

 ? Familiarity with reptile/exotic pet industry

 ? Experience with Gorgias, Zendesk, or similar CS platforms

 ? Track record of improving retention metrics in previous roles



WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE IN THIS ROLE

First 30 Days:

 ? Build and train a 2-3 person CS team from scratch

 ? Establish response templates and quality standards

 ? Demonstrate your team can de-escalate angry customers (not make them angrier)

 ? Show measurable improvement in customer satisfaction

 ? Handle urgent issues independently without waiting for approval

First 90 Days:

 ? Customer retention rate improving month-over-month

 ? Complaint escalations decreasing

 ? Response quality consistently high across all tea
mbers

 ? Clear systems in place for handling common issues

 ? Team operating smoothly with minimal daily oversight from you

Long-term:

 ? Customer service becomes a competitive advantage, not a liability

 ? Customers actively praise our service in community forums

 ? Retention metrics show we‚Äôre keeping customers for years, not months

 ? You‚Äôve built a self-managing team that maintains standards without constant supervision

 ? You can identify and fix problems before they become crises



DECISION-MAKING AUTHORITY

You will have authority to:

 ? Approve refunds and credits up to reasonable amounts

 ? Offer shipping upgrades or compensation to resolve issues

 ? Add extra product to shipments when needed

 ? Make judgment calls on customer situations without seeking approval for every decision

 ? Hire and terminate tea
mbers based on performance

We need a manager who can ACT, not someone who asks permission for everything.



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS

 ? Salary: Competitive rate based on experience and performance

 ? Performance-based increases: As retention metrics improve, your compensation can too

 ? Growth opportunity: As AAC grows, this role can expand in scope and compensation

 ? Autonomy: You‚Äôll have real authority to make decisions and build your team your way

 ? Payment: Via PayPal or Wise, reliable and on-time



OUR CULTURE & VALUES

 ? Honesty over politeness - we‚Äôd rather hear hard truths than comfortable lies

 ? Results over activity - we measure outcomes, not hours worked

 ? Customers are relationships, not transactions - each one represents years of potential revenue

 ? No ego, just service - we exist to serve reptile keepers authentically

 ? Accountability - we own our mistakes and fix them fast

 ? Direct communication - we value clarity and honesty, even when it‚Äôs uncomfortable

 ? Action over analysis - we fix problems, we don‚Äôt just explain them



RED FLAGS (Please don‚Äôt apply if this is you):

 ? You make excuses when things go wrong instead of owning problems

 ? You avoid difficult conversations or decisions

 ? You need extensive hand-holding or daily direction

 ? You prioritize process over results

 ? You can‚Äôt handle direct feedback without getting defensive

 ? You think customer service is just about being polite (it‚Äôs about retention)

 ? You‚Äôve never actually fired anyone

 ? You need consensus before making decisions

 ? You analyze problems more than you solve them



HOW TO APPLY

This application process will take 2-3 hours to complete properly. If you‚Äôre not willing to invest that time, please don‚Äôt apply.

Step 1: Submit your application through OnlineJobs.ph

Step 2: In your cover letter, answer ALL of these questions. Applications without complete, thoughtful answers will be automatically rejected:

QUESTION 1 - Leadership & Accountability:

Tell me about a time you had to fire someone on your team. What led to that decision and how did you handle it? (If you‚Äôve never fired anyone, explain why and whether you‚Äôd be capable of doing it.)

QUESTION 2 - De-escalation Skills:

A customer
s: ‚ÄúI just got my dubia roaches and half of them are DEAD. This is the second time this happened. I‚Äôm canceling my subscription and telling everyone in my reptile group to avoid you.‚Äù

Write the EXACT response you would send to this customer right now.

QUESTION 3 - Coaching Ability:

Here‚Äôs how one of our agents responded to an angry customer:

‚ÄúHi, I understand you‚Äôre frustrated with the issue. Unfortunately, due to system limitations, processing your refund requires a handoff to another department. We‚Äôre working on improving our processes. Your credit should reflect soon, though there may be display issues on your end. Let me know if you have questions!‚Äù

Answer these three parts:

(a) What‚Äôs wrong with this response?

(b) What should the agent have said instead? (Write the actual response)

(c) How would you coach this agent to prevent this in the future?

QUESTION 4 - Subscription Economics:

Explain why losing 10% of subscribers in a subscription business is different from losing 10% of customers in a regular e-commerce store. What does this mean for how you manage customer service?

QUESTION 5 - Decision Making Under Pressure:

You notice your team‚Äôs response times are slipping and customer satisfaction scores are dropping. I‚Äôm unreachable for the next 3 days. Walk me through exactly what you do, hour by hour for the first day.

QUESTION 6 - Metrics & Measurement:

What are the top 3 metrics you track for customer service in a subscription business and why? How do you know if your team is actually protecting customer relationships vs. just processing tickets?

QUESTION 7 - Handling Being Wrong:

Tell me about a time you made a decision you were confident in, and your boss told you that you were completely wrong. What happened next?

QUESTION 8 - Ownership vs. Excuses:

Your team missed retention targets this month. I ask you: ‚ÄúWhy did we lose more customers than usual this month?‚Äù Give me your answer right now.

QUESTION 9 - Crisis Management:

A customer calls you a scammer and threatens to report you to the BBB. Your agent responded by getting defensive and made it worse. The customer is now posting in
 groups calling you a scam company. What do you do in the next 60 minutes? Be specific - give me your action plan step by step.

QUESTION 10 - Direct Communication:

I tell you: ‚ÄúYour team sucks at de-escalating customers and if it doesn‚Äôt improve this week, I‚Äôm firing everyone including you.‚Äù

How do you respond to me? (Write your actual response)

QUESTION 11 - Fast Start:

You start Monday morning. By Friday end of day, you need to have hired 2 CS reps and handled a backlog of 50 angry customer
s while your new hires are training. Walk me through your week - what happens Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday?

Step 3: Provide the following:

 ? Your LinkedIn profile or professional portfolio (if you have one)

 ? At least 2 professional references with contact information (preferably former supervisors or people you managed)

 ? Any examples of customer service training materials, macros, or SOPs you‚Äôve created

 ? Screenshots or examples of customer service metrics/dashboards you‚Äôve tracked or built

 ? Your
 ID or preferred video call platform for interviews



WHAT GREAT ANSWERS LOOK LIKE:

 ? Specific, not generic - ‚ÄúI did X which resulted in Y‚Äù not ‚ÄúI believe in good customer service‚Äù

 ? Honest about challenges - You admit what‚Äôs hard, not just what you‚Äôre good at

 ? Action-oriented - You focus on what you DID, not what you thought about

 ? Numbers-driven - You mention metrics, results, improvements

 ? No jargon - You explain things clearly without hiding behind corporate buzzwords

 ? Ownership mentality - You say ‚ÄúI‚Äù not ‚Äúwe‚Äù when talking about your decisions



INTERVIEW PROCESS

 1. Application review (2-3 days) - We‚Äôll carefully review your answers to all 11 questions

 2. Video interview (45-60 minutes) - Deep dive into your experience, management philosophy, and how you handle real situations

 3. Practical assessment (90 minutes) - You‚Äôll review real customer complaints from our actual inbox and show us:

 ? How you‚Äôd respond to each

 ? How you‚Äôd coach the team

 ? What systems you‚Äôd put in place

 4. Reference check (1-2 days) - We‚Äôll speak with your references

 5. Final decision (1 day) - We move fast; if you‚Äôre the right fit, you could start within 1-2 weeks

Total timeline: 7-10 days from application to decision



IMPORTANT NOTES:

 ? We value your time - if you invest 2-3 hours in a thoughtful application, we‚Äôll give you detailed feedback even if you‚Äôre not selected

 ? We‚Äôre looking for ONE person, not multiple - this is a direct hire, not a pool

 ? We will check your references thoroughly

 ? We expect honesty - if you exaggerate or lie in your application, we will find out

 ? The work starts immediately - there‚Äôs no long onboarding or ‚Äúsettling in‚Äù period



READY TO APPLY?

This is a real leadership opportunity with a fast-growing company. We‚Äôre not looking for someone who needs their hand held. We‚Äôre looking for someone who can see a problem, own it, fix it, and build a team that prevents it from happening again.

If you understand that customer retention is the lifeblood of subscription businesses, if you can build and lead a team that protects customer relationships, and if you can handle direct communication without getting defensive - we want to hear from you.

Apply now through OnlineJobs.ph.

DO NOT apply if you‚Äôre not willing to answer all 11 questions thoroughly.

title: Backend Developer for Cashback and Affiliate Tracking Engine
description:
We are building a cashback and affiliate tracking platform similar in logic to TopCashback or Rakuten. We need a backend developer to implement the core transaction tracking and rewards engine.



This is not a simple CRUD website. The system must correctly handle:



‚Ä¢ Affiliate click tracking

‚Ä¢ Webhook and API ingestion from networks

‚Ä¢ Duplicate event handling and idempotency

‚Ä¢ Pending, confirmed and reversed transaction states

‚Ä¢ User balance calculation

‚Ä¢ Payout request processing

‚Ä¢ Transaction audit trail



You will be responsible for implementing:



‚Ä¢ Database schema design for users, clicks, transactions, ledger entries and payouts

‚Ä¢ Idempotent webhook processing logic

‚Ä¢ Event based transaction updates

‚Ä¢ Internal balance and ledger calculations

‚Ä¢ Admin tools for reconciliation and review

‚Ä¢ Secure API endpoints for frontend integration



Required experience:



‚Ä¢ Strong backend development experience (Node.js, Laravel, or similar)

‚Ä¢ Experience building API driven systems

‚Ä¢ Experience handling webhooks

‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of database design and transactions

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with queues or background workers

‚Ä¢ Understanding of race conditions and duplicate event prevention



Nice to have:



‚Ä¢ Experience with affiliate networks

‚Ä¢ Experience with payments or wallet systems

‚Ä¢ Experience with financial or accounting style systems



This role requires careful thinking about data integrity and correctness. Incorrect transaction handling is not acceptable. Please explain in your application how you would prevent double crediting a user if the same webhook is received multiple times. Please also refrain from replying to this application using an AI LLM, this will be monitored. 



Include examples of backend systems you have built that required reliable transaction processing. Fixed price contract. Clear milestones. Long term opportunity for the right developer.

title: Bookkeeper
description:
**Bookkeeper**



**Location:** Remote

**Job Type:** Gig / Contract

**Industry:** Retail / eCommerce / Consumer Goods



---







I am looking for an experienced bookkeeper to provide a **full catch-up bookkeeping service** using QuickBooks Online.



Business transactions go back to **December 2024**, and I need all records properly organized, reconciled, and prepared for audit and tax season.



**Important:**



* Purchases were made in **one currency** while revenue was earned in **another currency**.

* My business bank account is currently **not able to be directly connected to QuickBooks Online**, so reconciliation for that account will need to be handled **manually**.







The bookkeeper will be responsible for:



* Setting up and organizing my QuickBooks account correctly

* Importing and reconciling historical transactions (Dec 2024 ‚Äì present)

* Categorizing business expenses accurately

* Separating personal vs business expenses when needed

* Reconciling credit card statements (approximately 99% of purchases)

* Reconciling transactions from a personal debit card used for business purchases

* Reconciling one business bank account used for Shopify sales income (manual entry required)

* Managing multi-currency bookkeeping accurately

* Ensuring financial records are clean, accurate, and audit-ready

* Preparing bookkeeping reports suitable for review by an auditor







* Estimated total transactions: **Under 1,000**

* Income source: Shopify ? single business bank account

* Expense sources: Multiple credit cards + personal debit card







* Minimum **10 years of professional bookkeeping experience** (required)

* Strong expertise with **QuickBooks Online**

* Experience with multi-currency bookkeeping

* Experience preparing records for auditors or tax filings

* Strong attention to detail and accuracy

* Able to identify missing information and ask clear questions

* eCommerce/Shopify experience is a strong plus







**Fixed project rate:** $23000PHP





At project completion, I expect:



* Fully updated QuickBooks file

* All transactions properly categorized and reconciled

* Clean Profit & Loss and Balance Sheet reports

* Books prepared to submit to an auditor for tax season



---







Please include:



* Years of bookkeeping experience

* QuickBooks certifications (if any)

* Relevant experience with catch-up bookkeeping or eCommerce businesses

* Example of similar projects completed

title: Appointment Setter
description:
About the Role



The company is looking for a professional, articulate, and engaging Appointment Setter to join our team. This is a vital role within our client journey; you will be the first point of contact for attendees who have expressed interest in our services after the seminars.



Your primary objective is to build rapport with these individuals, answer preliminary questions, and successfully book them into a consultation with one of our expert consultants.



Working Hours & Commitment



Please note that we are looking for dedicated full-time employees to grow with the company.

‚Ä¢Commitment: We do not accept applications for part-time, freelance, or project-based work.

‚Ä¢Hours: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 5:00 PM UK Time (Monday to Friday).

‚Ä¢Break: Includes a 30-minute paid lunch break.

‚Ä¢Note: Please ensure you are comfortable working on the UK time zone shift (afternoon/evening Philippine time) before applying.



Technical Requirements



To ensure compatibility with our internal systems and maintain a high standard of professional communication, the following technical setup is strictly mandatory:

‚Ä¢Hardware: You must have a Windows laptop/PC (Intel Core i5 or higher). Please note that Mac computers are not compatible with some of the essential software we use for work.

‚Ä¢Audio: You must already possess a good quality noise-cancelling headset to ensure clear, professional calls with our clients.

‚Ä¢Connectivity: A stable primary internet connection is required.

‚Ä¢Redundancy: You must have a backup internet source (e.g., a secondary ISP or reliable mobile hotspot) and a backup power solution (e.g., a power station or UPS) to ensure zero downtime during power outages.



Key Responsibilities



‚Ä¢Post-Seminar Outreach: Proactively contacting seminar attendees via telephone to follow up on their interest.

‚Ä¢Diary Management: Coordinating and booking appointments into the consultants' calendars.

‚Ä¢CRM Maintenance: Ensuring all client interactions and appointment details are recorded accurately.

‚Ä¢Brand Representation: Acting as a professional ambassador for C&W, maintaining a warm and helpful tone at all times.



Benefits & Culture



We value our team and offer a comprehensive benefits package to support your work-life balance:

‚Ä¢Holiday Entitlement: 28 days of annual leave (inclusive of 8 Bank Holidays and 20 paid holidays). All holiday entitlement is pro-rated.

‚Ä¢Wellness & WFH Benefits: Dedicated wellness support and Work From Home (WFH) benefits to ensure a comfortable and productive environment after passing the probationary period.

‚Ä¢Ongoing Growth: A full range of additional benefits will be discussed during the induction training for successful candidates.



Application Requirements

To be considered for this role, please provide the following:

1.Your Resume

2.Loom/Video Introduction: A 3-5 minute video recording (please note: a voice recording alone is not sufficient) answering the following:

      o Introduce yourself.

      o Describe your professional background.

      o Explain why you believe you would be an excellent fit for this specific role at C&W.

      o Are you okay with the salary we stated here on OLJ, specifically a Php 50,000-60,000/monthly salary?



How to Apply



Please submit your application and the requirements listed above strictly via OnlineJobs.ph (OLJ).



Important Note: We kindly ask that you do not send applications directly to our company's mailbox. Any applications sent via
 will not be considered; please use the OLJ platform to ensure your application is reviewed by the team.

title: Lead Generation Specialist / Business Development Representative
description:
We‚Äôre looking for a motivated and results-driven Lead Generation Specialist to help grow our sales pipeline and expand our customer base. As a BDR, you‚Äôll be on the front lines of our sales efforts, identifying potential clients, generating leads, and nurturing opportunities to connect them with our solutions.



Key Responsibilities:

1. Proactively research and identify potential customers in target markets.

2. Reach out to prospects via
s, LinkedIn, and other communication channels.

3. Qualify leads to assess fit and interest, ensuring alignment with our services.

4. Schedule meetings or product demos between qualified leads and Sales Development Representatives.

5. Maintain accurate records of lead interactions and update CRM systems accordingly.

6. Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to execute campaigns and optimize lead generation strategies.

7. Stay up-to-date on industry trends and our product/service offerings to effectively communicate value propositions.



Qualifications:

- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (or equivalent experience).

- 2 - 3 years of experience in sales, business development, or a similar role (entry-level candidates with strong communication skills and a hunger to learn are also encouraged to apply).

- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

- Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport quickly.

- Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and eager to exceed targets.

- Proficiency in extracting data from LinkedIn Sales Navigator and other professional networks

- Must have a well-optimized LinkedIn account with atleast a minimum of 300 connections that can be used for prospecting

- Familiarity with CRM tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, PipeDrive) is a plus.

- Comfortable with cold outreach and prospecting.



Who we are:

Acadium started with the belief that anyone, anywhere, should be able to get the skills and experience they need to start their career without barriers like price, schedule, or location getting in their way. Acadium gives anyone the tools, support, and mentorship they need to launch their dream career. Acadium is the only platform that provides real work experience, accessible to everyone. Acadium began in 2017 with a team of 3 co-founders: Richard Shaw, Marco Tundo, and Moe Abbas. Since then, they‚Äôve attracted more than 120,000 student members and over 50,000 businesses to connect through the apprenticeship marketplace. Our team is growing and looking for people who are motivated, intelligent, and committed to making education accessible to join our team.



What we value:

Integrity - Be trustworthy in your actions

Care - Treat your teammates and our community as you would want to be treated

Curiosity - Ask questions. Always state your assumptions

Tenacity - Persevere when times are tough

Discipline - Be consistent in your actions

Ambition - Aspire to become better every day

Service -Serve your community to the best of your abilities.



Interested applicants may send updated CVs and LinkedIn URLs with a minimum of 300 connections to 

 Subject: [Adjective that describes you] B2B Lead Generation Specialist

**Note: Only applicants who submit their resumes and a LinkedIn with 300 connections will be evaluated.

title: Lead Generation Specialist / Business Development Representative
description:
We‚Äôre looking for a motivated and results-driven BDR / Lead Generation Specialist to help grow our sales pipeline and expand our customer base. As a BDR, you‚Äôll be on the front lines of our sales efforts, identifying potential clients, generating leads, and nurturing opportunities to connect them with our solutions.



Key Responsibilities:

1. Proactively research and identify potential customers in target markets.

2. Reach out to prospects via
s, LinkedIn, and other communication channels.

3. Qualify leads to assess fit and interest, ensuring alignment with our services.

4. Schedule meetings or product demos between qualified leads and Sales Development Representatives.

5. Maintain accurate records of lead interactions and update CRM systems accordingly.

6. Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to execute campaigns and optimize lead generation strategies.

7. Stay up-to-date on industry trends and our product/service offerings to effectively communicate value propositions.



Qualifications:

- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (or equivalent experience).

- 2 - 3 years of experience in sales, business development, or a similar role (entry-level candidates with strong communication skills and a hunger to learn are also encouraged to apply).

- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

- Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport quickly.

- Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and eager to exceed targets.

- Proficiency in extracting data from LinkedIn Sales Navigator and other professional networks

- Must have a well-optimized LinkedIn account with atleast a minimum of 300 connections that can be used for prospecting

- Familiarity with CRM tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, PipeDrive) is a plus.

- Comfortable with cold outreach and prospecting.



Who we are:

Acadium started with the belief that anyone, anywhere, should be able to get the skills and experience they need to start their career without barriers like price, schedule, or location getting in their way. Acadium gives anyone the tools, support, and mentorship they need to launch their dream career. Acadium is the only platform that provides real work experience, accessible to everyone. Acadium began in 2017 with a team of 3 co-founders: Richard Shaw, Marco Tundo, and Moe Abbas. Since then, they‚Äôve attracted more than 120,000 student members and over 50,000 businesses to connect through the apprenticeship marketplace. Our team is growing and looking for people who are motivated, intelligent, and committed to making education accessible to join our team.



What we value:

Integrity - Be trustworthy in your actions

Care - Treat your teammates and our community as you would want to be treated

Curiosity - Ask questions. Always state your assumptions

Tenacity - Persevere when times are tough

Discipline - Be consistent in your actions

Ambition - Aspire to become better every day

Service -Serve your community to the best of your abilities.

 provided below.

 Subject: [Adjective that describes you] B2B Business Development Representative

title: Remote Business Matching Assistant
description:
About the Role:

We are looking for a detail-oriented and people-focused Business Matching Assistant  to join our growing team. In this role, you will be responsible for understanding client needs, assessing candidate profiles, and ensuring the best possible matches between opportunities and talent. You will act as the bridge between clients and candidates, helping both parties succeed by creating long-term, strategic matches.



Key Responsibilities:

- Review client requirements and job descriptions to identify ideal candidate matches

- Assess and screen candidate profiles, resumes, and skill sets

- Coordinate interviews between clients and candidates

- Maintain accurate records of candidates, clients, and placements

- Provide regular updates and feedback to clients and candidates throughout the process

- Build strong relationships with both clients and candidates to ensure satisfaction and retention



Qualifications:

- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Human Resources, Business, Psychology, or related field (preferred)

- Previous experience in recruitment, staffing, or HR coordination is an advantage

- Strong communication and interpersonal skills

- Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail

- Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment

- Tech-savvy with the ability to use CRM tools



How to Apply:

If you are passionate about connecting people with the right opportunities and enjoy working in a dynamic environment, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

Please send your resume to 
 with the subject line: Application ‚Äì Business Matching Assistant

title: Outbound Sales Representative
description:
CalPro Inspection Group, one of the fastest growing and highest-rated home inspection and pest control companies in California, is looking for an experienced, personable and customer-focused outbound sales representative to join our team. If you‚Äôre a driven, self-motivated sales professional who thrives on closing deals, building relationships and helping customers solve real problems, this might just be the perfect opportunity for you.



As the first point of contact for prospective pest control customers, you‚Äôll play an integral role in shaping their experience with our company, making you a highly valued member of our staff. Your primary responsibilities will include cold calling past leads and previous home inspection clients from a provided list, introducing them to our services and recording key details in our CRM. You‚Äôll also follow up with prospects, schedule appointments, answer questions and coordinate with our in-office staff when needed. 



To be successful in this role, you must be highly adaptable, able to prioritize tasks effectively and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment while maintaining professionalism and accuracy at all times.

Success in this position isn‚Äôt just about hitting your numbers, though. It‚Äôs about becoming a trusted resource for our customers. At CalPro, we believe great salespeople do more than just close deals - they provide real solutions and build meaningful connections. Whether you‚Äôre following up with an inbound lead, nurturing an existing relationship or introducing our services to new accounts, your goal is to educate potential customers on the value of our services and position CalPro as a provider they can count on for the long haul.



So why choose to work with CalPro Inspection Group instead of another company? We‚Äôre glad you asked. We offer competitive compensation with uncapped commission, a supportive culture and plenty of opportunities to advance as our company continues to grow. If you‚Äôre looking to be part of a team where you can grow personally and professionally while making a real impact for customers and coworkers alike, we‚Äôd love to talk with you about joining the CalPro family.



To learn more about us, please visit 
. 



Applicants must submit a video or audio recording highlighting prior experience making cold calls. 



Responsibilities:

Make outbound calls to past leads, previous inspection clients and other provided lists.

Introduce prospective customers to pest control services.

Schedule appointments directly in company software.

Input notes and maintain accurate records in the CRM.

Follow up with prospects who request more time or were not reached on first contact.

Coordinate with in-office staff to ensure smooth scheduling and handoff.

Maintain professionalism in every customer interaction.



Requirements:

Fluent English speaker with clear and professional communication skills

Previous outbound calling and sales experience required

Tech-savvy and comfortable using CRMs and scheduling software

Reliable internet connection and quiet work environment

Availability to work 8:00 a.m. ‚Äì 5:00 p.m. EST

Self-motivated and comfortable handling high call volumes

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail



Benefits and Perks:

Competitive compensation

Supportive, team-oriented culture

One week annual paid vacation after 12 months of employment

Opportunities for advancement within the organization



About us

CalPro Inspection Group is a locally owned business that has been proudly serving residential and commercial customers across California since 2008. We consider ourselves a one-stop shop for our clients, offering services ranging from home inspections to pest control. Our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional service, clear communication and dependable solutions at every step. Whether we‚Äôre eliminating an ant infestation or addressing a rodent issue, we‚Äôre committed to doing what we say we‚Äôll do and exceeding customer expectations.

title: YouTube Video Editor (Longform, Shorts, Thumbnails, etc)
description:
About the Role:



I run a growing YouTube channel in the Amazon reselling / business space. I‚Äôm looking for a long-term video editor and creative partner who can help me edit high-quality longform YouTube videos, turn them into engaging short-form content (Shorts, Reels, TikTok), and actively contribute ideas to help grow the channel.



This is not just a basic editing role. I want someone who understands YouTube, pacing, hooks, and storytelling ‚Äî and wants to grow alongside the channel.



$300/Month Part-Time with the opportunity to grow into a Full-Time role



What You‚Äôll Be Doing:



- Edit longform YouTube videos (8‚Äì15 minutes)



- Create multiple short-form clips from each longform video



- Add engaging captions, jump cuts, zooms, b-roll, sound effects, and on-screen text when appropriate



- Help identify strong hooks for shorts



- Occasionally suggest title ideas, thumbnail concepts, or content ideas



- Collaborate with me to improve retention and engagement over time



What I‚Äôm Looking For:



- Strong experience editing YouTube videos (portfolio required)



- Experience creating YouTube Shorts / Reels / TikTok



- Good understanding of pacing, hooks, and viewer retention



- Comfortable taking feedback and improving quickly



- English comprehension strong enough to understand nuance and jokes



- Someone who actually cares about the channel‚Äôs growth, not just clocking hours



Bonus (Not Required, but Huge Plus):



- Familiar with business, e-commerce, or finance content



- Has worked with YouTube creators before



- Understands basic YouTube analytics (CTR, retention, AVD)



This Is For You If:



- You want a stable, long-term role



- You enjoy collaborating and contributing ideas



- You want to grow with a creator, not just edit files



BEFORE YOU'RE HIRED, I WANT YOU TO CREATE A SHORT 3-5 MINUTE TEST EDIT. THIS WILL BE PAID WORK.

title: Facebook Ads Manager
description:
Requirements:

Fluent English Speaking

Platform Mastery: 2+ years of hands-on experience in the Meta Ads Manager interface (including campaigns for traffic, conversions, engagement, lead generation, video, and dynamic ads across
 and Instagram).

Status: Full-Time

The Role:
 Ads Account Manager

OxBow USA is seeking a critical-thinking, data-driven
 Ads Specialist to own the technical management of 10‚Äì15 client accounts.

Unlike traditional agency roles, this is NOT a client-facing position. You will not be on client calls or managing
s with business owners. Instead, you will work directly with our internal Account Managers and Founders to execute high-level strategies, manage budgets, and optimize for results on the
 Ad accounts that 
 manages for other businesses.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing:

Full Account Management: Take 100% ownership of the Meta Ads Manager interface for 10‚Äì15 diverse business accounts. All companies/accounts are part of the Outdoor industry.

Execution & Iteration: Build, launch, and relentlessly optimize campaigns (including traffic, conversions, engagement, lead gen, video, carousel, collection, and dynamic/product ads) based on internal strategy briefs.

Budget Stewardship: Manage client budgets with extreme precision, ensuring we hit spend targets while maximizing ROI.

Critical Problem Solving: Don't just follow a checklist. Analyze "why" an account is fluctuating (e.g., audience fatigue, creative performance drops, or bidding inefficiencies) and propose technical solutions to fix it.

Internal Collaboration: Participate in weekly internal strategy syncs with OxBow managers to report on performance and plan upcoming technical moves.

Why This Role is Different:

Deep Work Environment: No client interruptions. No frantic "where is my ad?" phone calls. You are here to focus on the numbers and the creative.

Collaborative Support: Our Account Managers handle the "people stuff" and provide you with clear tasks and information from the client.

Training & Onboarding: We provide a 1-month paid training period to get you up to speed on the "OxBow Way" of managing accounts.

What We‚Äôre Looking For:

Critical Thinker: You look at a high cost-per-result and don't just see a number; you see an audience overlap issue, creative fatigue, or landing page friction point.

Budget Conscious: You treat the client's money as your own‚Äîmaximizing efficiency and preventing waste.

Team-First Communicator: Ability to explain technical ad concepts (like Advantage+ features, lookalikes, broad targeting, or creative testing) clearly to internal tea
mbers during weekly calls.

Accountability: You are self-motivated and take pride in "owning" the performance of your assigned cohort of accounts.

title: Frontend Manager ‚Äì Shopify Dropshipping (Fashion niche)
description:
Location: Remote





Job Type



Full-time or Part-time

‚Ä¢ 4‚Äì8 hours per day. Workload may vary depending on daily operations

‚Ä¢ Minimum 6 days/week



Commitment: Long-term position (3+ months)





About Us



We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating fashion dropshipping stores with hundreds of products and frequent product launches.



Our structure is organized with specialized people handling product listing, media buying, creative production, campaign launching, and product research.





Job Description & Responsibilities



We are looking for an experienced Frontend Manager who can fully manage and oversee the entire frontend operations, ensure quality control across all teams, and act as the main coordination point between the teams and me.



This is a high-responsibility position requiring leadership, organization, and strong Shopify fashion dropshipping experience.





You will be responsible for:

* Taking full ownership of frontend operations and day-to-day execution



* Ensuring smooth communication between teams and me



* Managing all people and checking the work of the product lister, media buyer, campaign launcher, creative strategist and maker, product researcher.





You must have hands-on experience in the 5 areas below, even if you won‚Äôt execute these tasks daily yourself. Otherwise, you won‚Äôt be able to properly manage or improve them.



Product Lister

* Verify product imports and optimization

* Check translations and product descriptions

* Ensure correct pricing and formatting

* Validate collections organization

* Ensure tools like Hextom, Photoroom, and Poky are used correctly



Media Buyer

* Monitor performance and scaling logic

* Ensure proper budget allocation



Campaign Launcher

* Validate campaign setup before launch

* Check campaign structure



Creative Strategist & Creative Maker

* Review ad creatives

* Check angle testing

* Ensure creatives match product positioning



Product Researcher

* Validate product selection quality using the
 Ad Library

* Confirm product meets scaling criteria





Proactivity & Process Optimization (Very Important)



We are not looking for someone who only follows existing SOPs.



You must be proactive and constantly look for ways to optimize, improve, and perfect every SOP and frontend process ‚Äî down to the smallest details.



What we expect:

* Regularly propose concrete optimizations for existing SOPs to improve speed, accuracy, and profitability

* Identify inefficiencies, errors, and bottlenecks before they become problems

* Suggest better tools, structures, and tracking systems when relevant



If you only execute instructions without questioning or improving them, this role is not for you.



We are looking for someone who thinks like a manager, not an executor.





Requirements



* Minimum 1+ year of experience as a Frontend Manager in a Shopify dropshipping store



Several months of hands-on experience for a Shopify dropshipping store in each area you will supervise, even if you won‚Äôt execute these tasks daily yourself:

* Product listing

* Media buying

* Campaign launching

* Creative strategy

title: Influencer & Social Media Marketing Specialist
description:
We run an e-commerce business in the herbal healing space, rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicine (a bonus if you're familiar). We are 100% Direct to Consumer (DTC) and largely a subscription-based business. 



Our Ambassador Program is a key growth channel, and we're looking for someone to lead outreach, management, and social engagement while providing community care through customer support.



Role Overview

This is a hybrid role focused primarily on ambassador management and social media engagement (70%) with customer experience support (30%). 

You'll report to the Head of Community Care and work closely with our CX Lead Agent and the broader CX team. 

You'll own the day-to-day ambassador relationships, social listening, content curation, and community engagement across Instagram and TikTok.



Primary Responsibilities: Ambassador Management & Social Media (70%)

Ambassador Outreach & Relationship Management

Source and recruit new ambassadors through proactive outreach on Instagram, TikTok, and other social platforms

Manage ambassador onboarding process and ongoing relationship nurturing

Process ambassador applications.

Track ambassador performance, content creation, and program engagement

Coordinate ambassador campaigns to drive additional conversions

Coordinate ambassador communications, including newsletter updates and program announcements

Request and organize raw b-roll content from ambassadors for internal content library

Monitor and report on ambassador-driven metrics and conversion performance



Social Media Engagement & Community Building

Reply to comments on our brand‚Äôs Instagram and TikTok accounts

Complete social engagement with ambassadors and niche creators in hormone health, TCM, period education, nervous system regulation, and holistic wellness across Instagram,
 groups, TikTok, Reddit

Leave thoughtful, specific comments on ambassador and relevant creator content (not generic engagement)

Build authentic relationships with emerging creators in our niche

Stay culturally relevant within the hormone health and TCM communities



Content Curation & Trend Research

Conduct weekly trending content research across TikTok and Instagram and identify trending videos/Reels weekly related to period symptoms, TCM, hormone healing, herbs, stress regulation, and related topics

Save content to organized collections and log links in tracking spreadsheet with analysis (hook, format, why it's trending)

Monitor daily social media tags, repost ambassador content to brand stories with branded backgrounds, and send personalized thank-you messages via DM

Download, organize, and archive all ambassador mentions, story tags, and weekly organic posts following established naming conventions and Drive folder structure



Secondary Responsibilities: Customer Experience (30%)

Respond to
, chat, or social media tickets from current and prospective customers, including:

Cancellation requests, website issues, shipping issues, order questions, product education

Follow Standard Operating Procedures when handling tickets

Escalate complex tickets to Lead Agent according to protocol

Process refunds, re-shipments, and other customer requests

Log product, fulfillment, and technology defects

Contribute customer insights during tea
etings





Additional Responsibilities

Support ad-hoc projects across Ops, Marketing, and Community Care teams

Maintain organized tracking systems for ambassador activities, social engagement, and customer interactions



The Ideal Candidate Will Have:

Required:

Exceptional English writing capabilities (understanding American terminology and expressions)

2+ years experience in influencer outreach, social media community management, or ambassador program coordination

Strong Instagram and TikTok native skills with ability to identify trends, spot emerging creators, and engage authentically

Highly organized with meticulous attention to detail

Experience with customer service handling
, chat, and SMS inbound tickets

Experience with Aspire, Shopify, Recharge, Gorgias, and Google Suite (especially Drive organization)

Comfort using AI tools (ChatGPT or other LLMs) to improve messaging and efficiency

Ability to work weekends (consistent schedule with start time between 8am-12pm EST, end time 5pm-9pm EST)

Self-starter mentality with ability to manage independent weekly tasks and proactively communicate status

Empathetic, warm communication style focused on building genuine relationships (not transactional engagement)

Eye for quality content and understanding of what makes posts replicable or scroll-stopping



Preferred:

Experience at an American DTC e-commerce startup in women's CPG, wellness, or healthcare

Prior experience managing or working with influencer/ambassador programs

Familiarity with Traditional Chinese Medicine, hormone health, or holistic wellness topics

Experience using content download tools and building organized content libraries

Experience with quiz platforms (Digioh, Pickzen, etc.)

Prior experience working with AI agents, escalating issues, and troubleshooting rules and knowledge bases

Personal interest in wellness, cycle health, or TCM



Next Steps

Please upload your resume and fill out this screening assessment: 
/to/vjnMl6uk to help us assess your interest in this role and how you handle various customer and ambassador scenarios. If it seems like a good fit, we'll reach out to schedule an interview. We'd love for someone to start by early March.

Your weekly target is simple: 4 qualification calls booked, converting to 2 discovery calls.



What You'll Do



Run multi-channel outreach via cold
, LinkedIn, and phone using Salesloft, Sales Navigator, Cognism, and Gmail

Engage and qualify senior EA personas across all enterprise verticals

Personalise messaging to resonate with decision-makers in UK, APAC, and Middle East

Track all activity and outcomes in Salesloft ‚Äî clean data is non-negotiable

Share weekly updates on what's working and what's not





What We're Looking For



2+ years of BDR/SDR experience, ideally in B2B SaaS or tech

Proven track record of hitting outbound targets (calls booked, meetings set)

Comfortable calling and
ing C-suite and senior leaders

Hands-on experience with Salesloft, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, or similar tools

Excellent written and spoken English ‚Äî you'll be engaging enterprise buyers

Self-directed and reliable ‚Äî this is a remote, async-friendly role

Availability to overlap with UK business hours for at least 4‚Äì5 hours daily





Nice to Have



Experience in Enterprise Architecture, IT transformation, or adjacent SaaS

Familiarity with APAC or Middle East enterprise buying culture





What You Get



¬£200‚Äì¬£250/month depending on experience

Performance bonus tied to meetings booked (discussed at offer stage)

Fully remote, flexible schedule

All tools provided ‚Äî you focus on execution





To Apply

Send a short Loom video (2‚Äì3 mins) introducing yourself and walking us through one outbound campaign you've run ‚Äî what you did, who you targeted, and what results you got. Applications without a Loom will not be considered.

title: Outbound Cold Calling Specialist
description:
Description:

We are looking for someone to join our team who is able and willing to develop a cold calling approach at EchoGlobal. You will speak with native English speakers in the USA, the UK, and Europe via cold calls. To be honest, we have not done this before. This opportunity is therefore suitable both for experienced candidates and for those with less experience who are eager to explore new ways of reaching new clients.



Our primary service is IT staff augmentation which is basically a type of recruitment for tech-oriented firms around the globe, additionally we offer traditional recruitment services. However, the market is currently very tough, so successfully securing even a few clients per year can be considered a very strong result.



Who are you?

Comfortable and confident on the phone ‚Äî you enjoy pitching and having conversations via phone.

Target-driven and motivated by results. You consider every ‚ÄúNo‚Äù as one step closer to a ‚ÄúYes‚Äù.

You analyze the outcome and change your approach when you see the need.

You like to research and test things ‚Äî you use different opening lines and compare them to get the best results.

You have

1-2 years‚Äô experience in outbound sales, BDR, SDR or business development of any kind in an IT related field.

English level at least C1 (verbal predominantly).

A tech-savvy mindset ‚Äî it‚Äôs not about writing code but about having a passion for technology, software, and automation.

What you will do

Research and build targeted lead lists.

Conduct outbound B2B sales calls, maintaining high daily call volumes (50 calls/day).

Follow up with interested prospects via
 or LinkedIn (if needed).

Accurately enter, update and maintain all relevant information in Zoho CRM.

Track calls analytics in Google Sheet and conversations in calling tools to analyze outcomes and performance.

Participate in regular internal meetings (initially daily, later weekly).

Our values

Honesty & Integrity.

Responsibility.

Perseverance.

Ambition.

Initiative.

Cooperation & Teamwork.

Interviewing Stages

Test Task:

Record an audio which simulates a cold call that lasts up to 60 seconds. In this call, you must start with an opening line that grabs attention. During the call, imagine the prospect says, ‚ÄúOK, go ahead‚Äù, and respond to it. You must also briefly explain our business service and value. Before ending the call, imagine the prospect says, ‚ÄúSorry, we are not interested‚Äù and respond to that as well.



We guarantee feedback to everyone who sends us a link to the recording.



Interview with the CEO/COO.

Reference Check and Job Offer.

Since 2013, Prodigy Media has built more than brands ‚Äî we've created an Amazon-native empire. With 12 years of proven success and 28+ product lines under our belt, we don't play small. Our mission? Launch culturally resonant, design-led, emotionally sticky products that dominate Amazon and beyond.

title: Amazon Inventory Specialist
description:
Amazon Inventory Specialist (Remote - Work from Home)



About the job

We're looking for an Amazon Inventory Specialist: a detail-oriented, organised self-starter who's eager to learn, contribute and grow within a fast-moving e-commerce team.



About Azure

We are an Amazon-focused e-commerce company founded in London in 2016. Our commitment to design led us to be recognised as one of the FT 1000 Fastest Growing Companies in Europe. At Azure, we transform everyday life through inspired products in homeware, toys and stationery.



What's the role?

We are looking for an Amazon Inventory Specialist to support our day-to-day operations across inventory management, shipments, listing maintenance and reporting. You'll work closely within the Operations team to keep things running smoothly across multiple Amazon marketplaces.

This is a fast-paced, data-rich environment. The more initiative you show, the faster you'll grow.

Supporting the setup of promotions, deals, vouchers and special events.

title: Bookkeeper (AR & Collections Focus)
description:
About Us:

Welcome to Assign ‚Äì where global talent thrives! We connect exceptional professionals like you with leading U.S. businesses, enabling you to showcase your skills on an international stage.



At Assign, we believe in fostering an environment where talent can grow and flourish. We're committed to personal and professional growth and aim for service excellence in everything we do. 



By joining our network, you will be a part of a vibrant community shaping the future of work, transcending borders, and transforming businesses. Be a part of our journey as we shape the future of work!



Hours: Full-Time, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST



Job Description:

We‚Äôre looking for a dependable, experienced, and detail-oriented Bookkeeper with strong Accounts Receivable expertise to manage financial records, ensure accuracy across accounting operations, and support consistent cash flow for the business.



This role is ideal for someone who enjoys structure, thrives on precision, and takes pride in maintaining clean books and organized financial systems ‚Äî while also feeling comfortable communicating directly with clients to follow up on outstanding invoices and collections.



You‚Äôll work closely with leadership to ensure the company‚Äôs finances are properly tracked, reconciled, and reported in a timely manner. The ideal candidate has strong end-to-end accounting knowledge, can manage priorities independently, and communicates clearly to keep billing and payments running smoothly.

Key Responsibilities:

Accounts Receivable & Client Collections

Manage the full Accounts Receivable cycle, including invoice creation, billing accuracy, and payment tracking.

Follow up with clients regarding overdue balances through
, phone, or other communication channels in a professional and confident manner.

Maintain consistent collections processes to ensure timely payments and healthy cash flow.

Resolve client billing questions or discrepancies promptly while maintaining strong client relationships.

Provide leadership with weekly AR summaries, aging reports, and collection status updates.





Bookkeeping & Accounting Management

Handle daily bookkeeping activities, ensuring all transactions are accurately recorded in the accounting system.

Manage Accounts Payable, including vendor payments, expense entries, and approvals.

Conduct bank and credit card reconciliations, resolving discrepancies quickly.

Maintain organized financial records and supporting documentation for all transactions.

Support month-end closing procedures and ongoing financial reviews.

Ensure compliance with internal accounting standards and processes.





Financial Reporting & Systems Support

Prepare financial statements, summary reports, and accounting outputs as needed.

Utilize QuickBooks (Online or Desktop) to maintain accurate ledgers and reporting.

Use 
 or similar tools to streamline payables, approvals, and vendor management.

Collaborate with management on payroll and accounting system integrations.

Identify inefficiencies in accounting workflows and suggest process improvements.





Cross-Functional & Administrative Support

Communicate regularly with leadership regarding financial progress, AR status, and cash flow updates.

Coordinate with other departments to ensure consistency of records and billing accuracy.

Handle confidential financial information responsibly and maintain strong data integrity.

Support administrative tasks related to bookkeeping, audits, filing, and documentation.

Participate in special accounting projects or additional assignments as needed.





Qualifications:

Minimum 2 years of bookkeeping or accounting experience, including 2‚Äì3 years of direct Accounts Receivable and collections experience.

Proven ability to follow up on overdue accounts and successfully secure payments.

Comfortable speaking with clients regarding outstanding balances while maintaining professionalism and strong relationships.

Strong understanding of AR aging reports, billing processes, and dispute resolution.

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field preferred.

Advanced proficiency in Excel and extensive experience with QuickBooks (Online or Desktop).

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple priorities independently in a remote setting.



What We Offer:

Paid Time Off (PTO)

Paid U.S. holiday leaves

Medical stipend after 3 months

Clear opportunities for growth and professional development

A collaborative, supportive, and people-first work environment



How to Apply:

Interested applicants should apply using this link: 



Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview. Applications will be accepted until the role is filled.

title: Online Math/Science Teacher(Near-Native Accent)
description:
About Pomelo Academy

Pomelo Academy is an innovative online international school dedicated to delivering high-quality education to students worldwide. We provide a dynamic and engaging learning environment, catering to individualized instruction that transcends geographical boundaries.



Job Description

We are seeking passionate and experienced Near-Native English-speaking Online K-12 Math and/or Science Teachers with verifiable teaching certifications. The ideal candidates will have strong academic backgrounds in Mathematics and/or Science, experience teaching young learners (ages 5‚Äì18), and a commitment to creating a supportive, inquiry-based, and engaging online learning environment.



Responsibilities



Deliver interactive and engaging Math and/or Science lessons to individuals and small groups of 2‚Äì6 students aged 5‚Äì18.

Teach using internationally recognized curricula such as A Closer Look, Glencoe Science, Pearson Interactive Science, NGSS-aligned resources, Singapore Math, or IB/AP/A Level Math programs.

Create age-appropriate lesson plans focused on conceptual understanding, inquiry, problem-solving, and real-world applications.

Incorporate visuals, multimedia, and hands-on virtual activities to make abstract concepts accessible and engaging.

Monitor student progress and provide timely feedback to students and parents.

Foster curiosity, discussion, and active learning in a safe and supportive space.



Qualifications



Professional teacher with at least 2 years of teaching experience (Kindergarten‚ÄìGrade 12).

Must hold a valid teaching license/certification (e.g., Teaching License, State Certification). TESOL/TEFL is a plus.

Near-native English accent with excellent spoken and written communication skills.

Strong academic background in Mathematics and/or Science (Biology, Physics, Chemistry, General Science).

Experience teaching in public/international schools or reputable online platforms.

Familiarity with inquiry-based and/or interdisciplinary approaches (e.g., STEM/STEAM).

Comfortable working between 07:00‚Äì22:00 (Weekdays) and 9:00‚Äì22:00 (Weekends), GMT+8.

Proficiency with digital platforms such as ClassIn, Microsoft Office, and other educational technologies.

Must have a stable and fast internet connection and a PC/laptop with at least Windows 10 or Mac OS Catalina.



Benefits



Flexible working hours.

Opportunity to teach using globally respected Math and Science curricula.

Be part of an international, passionate team of educators.

Access to training and professional development.

Regular enrollment model (not a booking system), ensuring schedule stability and consistency

 and

mbers.

Shape

Shape

 and/or 
 strongly preferred.

Shape

title: Parent Coach / Family Facilitator
description:
Job Summary

The Parent Coach / Facilitator provides virtual coaching services to families to improve parenting skills, communication, routines, and overall family functioning. Coaching sessions are provided online through secure video platforms or by phone.

The coach helps parents learn practical skills to manage behavior challenges, reduce stress, and improve family relationships.

Preferred candidates have education or background in Psychology, Social Work, Counseling, or related human services fields.



Main Responsibilities



Virtual Family Coaching

‚Ä¢ Conduct parent coaching sessions virtually through video or phone

‚Ä¢ Help families build routines and structure in the home



‚Ä¢ Support parents in addressing behavior and communication challenges



‚Ä¢ Model positive parenting techniques during sessions



‚Ä¢ Provide encouragement and practical solutions



Service Planning & Documentation

‚Ä¢ Develop virtual coaching plans with families



‚Ä¢ Maintain timely documentation and progress reports



‚Ä¢ Track family progress toward service goals



‚Ä¢ Maintain accurate and organized digital service records



Family Support & Advocacy

‚Ä¢ Provide emotional support and motivation



Collaboration & Communication

‚Ä¢ Participate in virtual team meetings and case consultations

‚Ä¢ Maintain professional communication with partners and agencies



Skills Needed

‚Ä¢ Strong communication and listening skills



‚Ä¢ Ability to build trust and rapport virtually



‚Ä¢ Patience and empathy when working with families



‚Ä¢ Ability to teach and guide without judgment



‚Ä¢ Strong documentation and organization skills



‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently in a remote environment



‚Ä¢ Comfort using virtual meeting platforms and digital tools



Education & Experience

Preferred qualifications include:



‚Ä¢ Degree or coursework in Psychology, Social Work, Counseling, or Human Services



‚Ä¢ Experience working with families or children



‚Ä¢ Experience in coaching, mentoring, counseling, or social services preferred





Personal Qualities

‚Ä¢ Compassionate and respectful



‚Ä¢ Professional and dependable



‚Ä¢ Flexible and adaptable



‚Ä¢ Strong boundaries and ethical standards



‚Ä¢ Motivated to help families succeed

s, ads, website updates and digital products are handled reliably

title: Service Coordinator ‚Äì Client & Guard Operations (Security Services)
description:
Service Coordinator ‚Äì Client & Guard Operations (Security Services)



Remote (Philippines) | Full-Time | Long-Term Role



Pay & Growth

 ‚Ä¢ $6‚Äì$10 USD/hour to start (based on experience)

 ‚Ä¢ Performance-based raises

 ‚Ä¢ Long-term growth into Senior Service Coordinator / Operations Lead



?



About Us



We are a U.S.-based security services company managing guards and client accounts across multiple sites.

Our Service Coordination team is the bridge between:

 ‚Ä¢ Clients

 ‚Ä¢ Security guards

 ‚Ä¢ Dispatch & operations

 ‚Ä¢ Management



This role is critical to making sure services are delivered correctly, issues are resolved fast, and clients remain happy.



?



What You‚Äôll Do



You will help run day-to-day security operations, including:

 ‚Ä¢ Be the main point of contact for client requests and service issues

 ‚Ä¢ Coordinate guard schedules, coverage, and replacements

 ‚Ä¢ Track attendance, call-offs, and shift changes

 ‚Ä¢ Follow up on guard performance and client feedback

 ‚Ä¢ Create and update service tickets in the CRM

 ‚Ä¢ Escalate serious issues to management when needed

 ‚Ä¢ Keep records organized (sites, guards, issues, notes)

 ‚Ä¢ Help ensure contract scope of work is being followed



You will not just take messages ‚Äî you will own the resolution process from start to finish.



?



What We‚Äôre Looking For



Please apply only if you have:

 ‚Ä¢ 2+ years experience in operations, customer support, account management, or coordination roles

 ‚Ä¢ Experience working with guards, field teams, or service staff (security, logistics, facilities, etc. is a big plus)

 ‚Ä¢ Strong English communication skills (written and spoken)

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable handling multiple issues at the same time

 ‚Ä¢ Calm under pressure and good at problem-solving

 ‚Ä¢ Basic experience with CRM or ticketing systems (or strong willingness to learn)



This is not a simple VA or admin role ‚Äî it‚Äôs an operations coordination role with real responsibility.



?



Nice to Have (Not Required)

 ‚Ä¢ Experience in security, dispatch, or guard operations

 ‚Ä¢ Experience working with U.S. clients

 ‚Ä¢ Experience with GoHighLevel, CRM, or ticketing systems

 ‚Ä¢ Experience with call handling or live chat support



?



What Success Looks Like

 ‚Ä¢ Client issues resolved quickly and clearly

 ‚Ä¢ Guards properly scheduled and covered

 ‚Ä¢ Fewer missed shifts and service gaps

 ‚Ä¢ Clean, updated records in the system

 ‚Ä¢ Clients feel supported and informed

 ‚Ä¢ Operations run smoothly with fewer escalations



?



Who This Role Is For

 ‚Ä¢ Operations coordinators

 ‚Ä¢ Client support or account managers

 ‚Ä¢ Dispatchers or operations assistants

 ‚Ä¢ People who enjoy solving problems and managing workflows



?



Not a Fit If You Are

 ‚Ä¢ Looking for a simple VA or admin-only role

 ‚Ä¢ Not comfortable dealing with clients or field staff

 ‚Ä¢ Easily stressed by urgent situations

 ‚Ä¢ Not willing to follow SOPs and workflows



?



How to Apply



Please include:

 ‚Ä¢ A short summary of your operations or coordination experience

 ‚Ä¢ Any experience working with guards, drivers, field teams, or service workers

 ‚Ä¢ The tools or CRMs you‚Äôve used

 ‚Ä¢ Your internet speed and work setup

title: Lead Generation & Outreach Virtual Assistant (Instagram ‚Äì AU Market)
description:
We are a Melbourne, Australia-based social media agency that helps cafes and restaurants grow through short-form video content.



We are looking for a detail-oriented and efficient Virtual Assistant to support our lead generation and outreach operations. This role focuses on identifying qualified businesses using Instagram and Google Maps, verifying strict criteria, and executing structured outreach using provided scripts.



This role plays a key part in generating new business opportunities for the agency.



Scripts and templates will be provided. Outreach is process-based and requires inserting the correct business details accurately.



Strong written English is mandatory. Outreach messages will be sent directly to business owners. Clear, natural, and professional communication is essential.



We value professionalism, reliability, and clear communication.





RESPONSIBILITIES:



Researching cafes and restaurants in Melbourne (within 35km of the CBD)



Using Instagram and Google Maps to identify potential leads



Checking Instagram activity and Reel performance



Calculating average Reel views based on defined criteria



Ensuring businesses meet qualification rules



Accurately entering and validating data in Google Sheets



Sending outreach messages using provided scripts



Filling in correct business details within templates



Avoiding duplicates and incorrect entries



Following SOPs exactly and working efficiently





REQUIREMENTS:



Excellent written English (mandatory)



Strong attention to detail



Experience using Instagram and Google Maps for research



Strong knowledge of Google Sheets



Comfortable sending outreach messages using templates



Ability to follow detailed SOPs exactly



Efficient and able to work independently



Reliable internet connection and computer



Must be responsive during agreed working hours



This is a results-focused role where consistency and accuracy are important.



We are looking for someone seeking a long-term position, not short-term freelance work.





WORK SCHEDULE:



Part-time or full-time



Long-term role with potential to increase responsibilities based on performance





TO APPLY, PLEASE INCLUDE:



1. The number 125 in your application



2. A brief summary of your lead generation experience



3. A brief summary of your outreach experience (if any)



4. How many hours you are available per week



5. Your expected weekly rate (in USD)



Only complete applications that follow the instructions above will be reviewed.





APPLICATION SCREENING TASK



Note: While the role involves researching both cafes and restaurants, this screening task requires a cafe only.



As part of your application, complete the following:



1. FIND ONE CAFE



Find one cafe only in Melbourne (within 35km of the CBD).



Do not submit a restaurant, bar, takeaway shop, or dessert business. Cafes only.



The cafe must:

Have at least 6 recent Reels available

Have posted at least one Reel within the last 30 days



2. CALCULATE THE AVERAGE REEL VIEWS



Go to the cafe‚Äôs Instagram profile and:



Click on the Reels tab

Ignore pinned Reels

Use the 6 most recent non-pinned Reels only

Calculate the average views across those 6 Reels



Provide:



Business name

Instagram handle

The calculated average Reel view count





3. REWRITE THIS MESSAGE



Rewrite this sentence in natural, professional English:



‚ÄúHi we help cafe grow with short video if interested we talk?‚Äù



Please complete this section in your own words without using AI tools. English proficiency will be assessed during the interview.

title: Visual Designer / Developer (6-9 USD Per Hour)
description:
1 Job Opening: Visual Designer/Developer Specialized in Shopify, WordPress, and Elementor



**About Us:**



Our branding and web design agency is on the hunt for a talented Visual Designer/Developer with significant expertise in Shopify, WordPress, Elementor, and Digital Design. We are dedicated to creating innovative website and e-commerce solutions for our clients. We welcome a motivated tea
mber who can add real value to a wide array of businesses.



**Key Responsibilities:**



1. Design and develop responsive websites utilizing Shopify, WordPress, and Elementor.

2. Create comprehensive brand identities and design systems for clients.

3. Design visually appealing and user-friendly website wireframes.

4. Work closely with our team of designers and developers to ensure consistency and effectiveness in all designs.

5. Implement and manage website features, including custom themes and apps, and integrations with third-party services.

6. Ensure website compatibility across all browsers and devices.

7. Provide technical support to clients and resolve site issues promptly.

8. Stay attuned to the latest trends and best practices in Shopify, WordPress, Elementor, and digital design.



**Software Expertise:**



- Proficiency in Shopify, WordPress, and Elementor

- Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript

- Expertise in Adobe Creative Suite and Figma

- Familiarity with Notion or similar project management software



**Qualifications:**



1. Outstanding proficiency in Shopify, Wordpress, Woo Commerce & Elementor.

2. Minimum of 2+ years of experience in website development using Shopify, WordPress, and Elementor.

3. Minimum of 2+ years of experience as a Digital Designer (preferred).

4. Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design principles.

5. Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.

6. Strong communication and collaboration skills.

7. Passion for e-commerce and aiding businesses in online growth.

8. Solid portfolio showcasing design skills and experience.



People who can meet these expectations and excel in project management (managing timelines, budgets, resources) while having a keen understanding of branding and web design principles are especially welcome.



**Application process:**



Applicants are requested to submit their r√©sum√©, portfolio, and a succinct cover letter detailing why you would be the best candidate to 
 also include 1-3 brand guidelines/identities and 1-2 website wireframes (preferably Figma files) as part of your application.



We are an equal opportunity employer that promotes diversity. All qualified applicants will receive consideration devoid of discrimination based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other protected characteristic under law.

title: Google Business Profile Data Collection VA
description:
Email Collection Task The immediate objective is to locate and record direct
 addresses for 117 businesses listed in a provided spreadsheet.

‚Ä¢ Workflow: For each business, research the website and social media to find a valid contact
. If an
 is found, complete the remaining 6 columns for that row available in the Google Business Profile

‚Ä¢ The "Stop" Rule: If no
 is found after a thorough search, the research stops for that business to maximize efficiency.

‚Ä¢ Turnaround: Data must be returned to SRP for review within 24 hours from engagement time.



Compensation & Terms

‚Ä¢ Rate: $0.50 (one-half dollar) for each accurate and accepted
 address.

‚Ä¢ Payment Condition: Payment is released upon verification of data accuracy and validity of the
 addresses provided.

‚Ä¢ NOTE: Another job will be posted asking for completion of 22 columns of data for Google Business Profile for 100+ businesses.

‚Ä¢ Payment to be authorized within 2 days of approval by SRP

title: SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGER FOR AN AGENCY
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE

We‚Äôre hiring a full-time, hands-on Social Media Manager to help manage multiple U.S. brands.

If you‚Äôre creative, organized, and ready to produce daily results ‚Äî this is for you.



You‚Äôll be responsible for planning, creating, and scheduling engaging content across Instagram,
, and TikTok. You‚Äôll help our team grow brand visibility, engagement, and community while keeping everything on schedule and consistent.



This is a serious, long-term position with the possibility of future growth within the company‚Äî not a side gig.



Salary: $1,100/month (Paid Weekly ‚Äì $250 every Monday after productivity review)

Schedule: 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM, or 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM EST (New York Time)

Hours: 40 Hours/Week ‚Äì Full Time

Tracker: Time Doctor Required



RESPONSIBILITIES



Plan, design, and schedule daily content (reels, posts, stories)

Create visuals using Canva and short videos using CapCut

Manage engagement (comments, replies, DMs)

Report weekly analytics and key performance metrics

Support paid campaigns and cross-platform promotions

Maintain a consistent brand tone and creative direction



WORK REQUIREMENTS & ACCOUNTABILITY

This role is for serious, full-time professionals only.

You will be required to work to get paid ‚Äî every hour must be productive and verifiable.



MANDATORY:

Time tracking with Time Doctor (screenshots, activity, and hours are reviewed daily by our accountant)

Work Hours: 8 hours per day in between 6am to 5pm window (New York Time)

Minimum 40 hours per week

Fast, stable internet connection

Quiet, private workspace ‚Äî no background noise or interruptions

Must attend daily Zoom video check-ins (camera on) and be available for phone calls and real-time communication during work hours.

Must comply with Confidentiality & NDA Agreements

If you can‚Äôt stay consistent, accountable, and available ‚Äî do not apply.



PERFORMANCE & GROWTH

We believe in rewarding results. This is a long-term position with performance reviews every 90 days. Consistent output, reliability, and initiative will lead to salary increases and more responsibility. We reward work ethic, creativity, and results ‚Äî not idle time.



We invest in people who work hard, communicate clearly, and deliver measurable results.



REQUIREMENTS

Proven experience managing social media for brands (preferably U.S. clients)

Strong English communication & writing skills

Skilled in Canva, CapCut, Metricool, or similar tools

Organized, reliable, and responsive

Honest, self-motivated, and results-oriented
