title: Virtual Executive Assistant
description:
I'm the founder of a digital growth marketing company that helps mission-driven founders scale their businesses with more ease & less overwhelm - and I'm looking for a small team of highly-skilled Executive Assistants to help take over the marketing and management tasks that make a huge difference in the lives of the people that hire us.



I'm looking for a max of 5 amazing executive assistants available for part-time (potential for full time) with a salary starting at $500 USD per month and with long term success and robust training, moving up to $700 USD per month as an emerging leader in the company.



If you have the following skill sets, I encourage you to apply:



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:

- Minimum of 3‚Äì5 years of experience in Digital Marketing, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Content Creation, and Executive Assistant Work (Administrative Tasks, Calendar &
 Management, etc)

You‚Äôre trusted to manage marketing deliverables while providing high-level executive support, keeping priorities organized, systems moving, and leadership focused on growth instead of day-to-day execution. You've done it all from managing schedules to
 & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language



- 1+ years of experience in Sales Funnels and Shopify

You're a professional who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software



- 1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram,
, Tik Tok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing

You're an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus



- Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)

You‚Äôll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, all that and a bag of chips :-)



- Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: You‚Äôre familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and
 service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren‚Äôt foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)



ABOUT YOU:

- ‚ÄúYou down with SOP? Yeah you know me!‚Äù‚ÄîYou‚Äôre an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.

- Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.

- You‚Äôre aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.

- You‚Äôre addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you‚Äôve seen how powerful it can be in business growth

- You‚Äôre driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can‚Äôt improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.

- Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.

- You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You‚Äôre no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we‚Äôre intentional with our resources.

- You‚Äôre a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.



If you‚Äôre nodding your head ‚ÄúYes‚Äù to the above, proceed below to apply.



PERKS:

I'm committed to setting our staff up for success with access to trainings that will certify your skills in:

- Task & Calendar Management

- Launch/Sales Strategy Planning

- Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)

- Social Media Management

- Digital Media Marketing (Including
 and SMS Marketing)

- Lead Generation



After one week of training and assessment, you're officially certified under our internal training program, which means hitting the ground running with your new skills. Perks include:

- Part time work hours

- Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)

- Starting Salary at $500 USD a month ($6000 USD annual)

- Internal certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career (I have helped clients amass at least $10M from the same digital growth marketing strategies I will require you to learn)



Interested? Please reply to this post with the secret keyword "APPLES" so I know you can pay attention to detail - from there, I'll let you know next steps if you qualify.

title: Walmart Retail Link / Supplier One Catalog Manager Specialist
description:
Job Type



Part-time to Full-time (10-20 hrs/week)



Salary



(~$6‚Äì$8 USD/hour)



Based on verified Walmart Retail Link / Supplier One experience



About the Role



We are a U.S.-based consumer products company selling wholesale to Walmart (1P). We are looking for someone with hands-on experience in Walmart Retail Link and Supplier One to help us set up and manage products for wholesale purchase orders.



???? This role is NOT for Walmart Marketplace / DTC.

???? If you have not worked directly inside Retail Link / Supplier One, please do not apply.



Responsibilities



Set up and manage items in Walmart Supplier One for wholesale orders



Enter and maintain:



Item cost, pack configuration, and logistics details



Warehouse alignment / ship points



Factory ID and supplier facility details



Add and manage U.S. and international factories



Troubleshoot item setup issues that block PO creation



Submit and follow up on Walmart support tickets as needed



Required Experience (Strict Requirement)



Proven experience using Walmart Retail Link AND Supplier One



Experience must be with Walmart wholesale (1P), not Marketplace



Able to explain item setup and factory onboarding fro
mory



Strong written English



?? Applications without direct Retail Link / Supplier One experience will be rejected.



Application Questions (Answer in Your Own Words ‚Äì No AI)



Do NOT use ChatGPT or AI tools. Generic answers will be rejected.



How many years have you worked directly in Walmart Retail Link / Supplier One?

Include whether this was for wholesale (1P) or Marketplace (DTC).



Briefly explain the steps to add a new product in Supplier One so Walmart can issue a PO.



How do you add a factory and obtain a Walmart Factory ID?

What information is required?



What is the difference between an Associated Facility and a Disassociated Facility?



What are common mistakes that prevent Walmart from placing a purchase order after item setup?

title: Marketing & HubSpot Specialist
description:
About Us

We are Agentive (
), an AI-native delivery platform and services company helping organisations harness the power of AI for faster delivery, smarter automation, and measurable outcomes. We combine cutting-edge AI workflows with strategic process design to help businesses grow, transform, and scale.



Our work spans strategic AI consulting, AI employees, custom development solutions, and workflow optimisation, all designed to deliver real impact, not just recommendations.



Role Overview

We are seeking an experienced Marketing & HubSpot Specialist who understands that marketing success starts with strategy and process design, not just tool proficiency.



This role is for a marketer who can:

* Design intelligent, scalable sales and marketing processes

* Translate business goals into structured funnels and lifecycle stages

* Configure HubSpot and other tools to support those processes

* Integrate AI tools (including outbound lead platforms) to amplify performance



You will be responsible for end-to-end marketing strategy, execution, and optimisation for our SaaS and service offerings.



Key Responsibilities

* Design and document robust sales & marketing processes that guide prospects through lifecycle stages, from lead capture to qualification and conversion

* Translate business goals and buyer behaviours into structured marketing and automation workflows

* Configure and manage HubSpot CRM (pipelines, properties, lead scoring, lists, workflows, 360¬∞ tracking, reporting)

* Plan, build, and execute targeted campaigns 
, nurture journeys, inbound and outbound sequences)

* Integrate systems and tools including Apollo.io and other modern AI/automation platforms to create seamless lead flows

* Implement lead scoring, segmentation, and qualification frameworks

* Analyse campaign performance, iterate, and optimise based on data and strategic goals

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure marketing ¬ª sales alignment and consistent messaging



Required Skills & Experience

* HubSpot expertise: CRM setup, automation workflows, campaign building, analytics

* Strategic marketing experience: designing full-funnel processes, not just using tools

* Proven track record with SaaS or tech service marketing

* Experience with Apollo.io or equivalent lead generation and AI-assisted platforms

* Strong
 marketing knowledge, including deliverability and lifecycle messaging

* Ability to translate business requirements into automated systems and dashboards

* Data-driven mindset with a focus on optimisation and measurable results



What We‚Äôre Looking For

* A strategic thinker who goes beyond tool operation

* A systems designer who can map processes and build frameworks

* A hands-on executor who deploys campaigns and measures impact

* A marketer who aligns marketing outcomes with business goals and the customer journey



Benefits

* Work with an innovative, AI-first organisation transforming how businesses operate

* Opportunity to shape and own the sales & marketing process

* Exposure to emerging AI technologies and platforms

* Collaborative environment focused on strategic impact and measurable outcomes



How to Apply

Please send us the following:

* Your updated CV / Resume

* A cover letter outlining your experience designing a full sales & marketing process (not just tool usage)

* A detailed example of a funnel or workflow you designed, including the why and the results

* A list of AI tools you‚Äôve used, and how they contributed strategically to your campaigns

* Your expected project based salary (AUD)

* Availability (hours/week)



And put the word "Apollo" to show you read the entire post



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: AI Cartoonist / Visual Story Artist
description:
Project: Pawwslyfe ‚Äì Kids Sports Animation Series (YouTube)



OVERVIEW

We are building a premium animated YouTube series for ages 5‚Äì8 centered around basketball, teamwork, and confidence. We are looking for a skilled AI-assisted cartoonist who can generate consistent characters, environments, and visual storytelling frames across episodes. This is not a one-off gig. We are building a long-term series.



WHAT YOU'LL BE CREATING

‚Ä¢ Consistent character visuals (Raww Raww, Charlie, Daisy, Bella, etc.)

‚Ä¢ Gym scenes, urban courts, classroom settings

‚Ä¢ Shot-by-shot frames based on detailed scripts

‚Ä¢ Thumbnail-ready hero images

‚Ä¢ Background plates and clean character poses

‚Ä¢ Minor pose variations for dialogue scenes



All episodes will follow structured scripts with scene breakdowns and timing.



REQUIRED SKILLS

‚Ä¢ Advanced experience with AI art tools (Leonardo, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, etc.)

‚Ä¢ Ability to maintain character consistency across 10+ images

‚Ä¢ Understanding of camera angles (low-angle, tracking, push-in, etc.)

‚Ä¢ Ability to follow detailed production blueprints

‚Ä¢ Strong composition and lighting sense

‚Ä¢ Kid-friendly visual sensibility

‚Ä¢ Ability to recreate the same character from multiple angles



BONUS SKILLS (Preferred but Not Required)

‚Ä¢ Experience animating in CapCut, After Effects, or similar

‚Ä¢ Understanding of sports visuals and basketball movement

‚Ä¢ Experience building visual style guides

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of prompt engineering systems



WHAT WE ARE NOT LOOKING FOR

‚Ä¢ Random AI art dumps

‚Ä¢ Style inconsistency

‚Ä¢ Overly "3D render" look

‚Ä¢ Unstructured workflow

‚Ä¢ One-off freelancers who disappear



We are building a brand.



DELIVERABLES PER EPISODE

‚Ä¢ 25‚Äì40 finalized scene frames

‚Ä¢ 4‚Äì6 reusable character pose variations

‚Ä¢ Clean background plates

‚Ä¢ Thumbnail image

‚Ä¢ Organized file structure



TONE & VISUAL DIRECTION

Sporty, Urban, Confident, Clean, Family-friendly

Think: Premium kids sports series, Controlled energy, Cinematic but not chaotic



TO APPLY

Please include:

‚Ä¢ Portfolio (AI-generated work only)

‚Ä¢ What AI tools you use

‚Ä¢ Example of maintaining one character across multiple angles

‚Ä¢ Your workflow for keeping consistency

‚Ä¢ Your weekly availability

‚Ä¢ Your rate per episode



REQUIRED TEST TASK (Must complete to be considered):

Create a 30-45 second animated scene of a basketball pup character performing these actions:

- Dribbling a basketball

- Taking a shot

- Celebrating



Requirements:

‚Ä¢ Use AI art tools to generate character frames

‚Ä¢ Animate in CapCut, After Effects, or similar

‚Ä¢ Show character consistency throughout the scene

‚Ä¢ Include basic motion and smooth transitions

‚Ä¢ Kid-friendly style, cinematic sports lighting

‚Ä¢ Export as MP4 (1080p)



Submit your test animation with your application. Deadline: 72 hours after you receive character reference details.



BUDGET

Open to discussion based on skill level. Looking for long-term partnership, not lowest bid.

title: AI-Driven Video Storyteller
description:
AI-Driven Video Storyteller



Location: Remote | Full-Time | Strong Overlap with Eastern Hours



Compensation: Competitive pay. Depends on experience and location. 



Why This Role Rocks: This is not just a cut-and-trim editing role. As our AI-Powered Video Storyteller, you‚Äôll be shaping how industry leaders are seen and heard on one of the most powerful platforms in the world: YouTube. You‚Äôll have creative ownership over turning raw conversations into compelling, binge-worthy video experiences that position our clients as the go-to authority in their space.



You‚Äôll collaborate directly with our Founder and creative team, editing content for high-caliber entrepreneurs who are already leaders in their fields. Your work won‚Äôt just make videos look good, it will amplify voices, sharpen messages, and help clients grow their influence and business through the power of long-form video.



If you‚Äôre someone who loves storytelling, thrives at the intersection of creativity and technology, and gets excited about leveraging AI tools to push video further, this is your seat.



The Role:

As our Long-Form Video Editor, you‚Äôll own the editing pipeline for client podcasts and video content. You‚Äôll use AI-powered editing tools (Descript, Captions.ai, CapCut, etc.) to streamline workflows, add polish, and ensure content is both high-quality and platform-ready.



This is a hybrid of technical editing, creative storytelling, and YouTube optimization. Perfect for someone who understands how long-form content works on digital platforms and is excited about helping proven entrepreneurs shine on video.



Responsibilities:

Editing & Production:

Edit long-form podcast videos (30‚Äì60+ minutes) into polished, professional content.

Use AI tools (Descript, Captions.ai, CapCut, etc.) to accelerate workflow while maintaining creative quality.

Add captions, graphics, b-roll, transitions, and sound design for clarity and engagement.

Ensure audio and video sync is clean and production value is high.



Content Optimization:

Prepare videos optimized for YouTube (metadata, chaptering, thumbnail guidance, etc.).

Repurpose long-form content into shorter clips when needed.

Apply storytelling and pacing techniques to keep viewers engaged across long runtimes.



Workflow & Collaboration:

Collaborate with producers, account strategists, and the creative team to meet deadlines.

Maintain an organized editing pipeline and keep projects moving without bottlenecks.

Manage assets, templates, and editing libraries for efficiency.



Must-Have Experience:

2+ years professional video editing experience (agency or client-based preferred).

2+ years as either an avid podcast listener and/or have created podcasts in the past.

Proficiency with Descript, CapCut, Captions.ai, or similar AI editing tools.

Strong grasp of YouTube as a platform: what keeps viewers watching, how videos rank, and what drives engagement.

Portfolio of edited long-form content (especially podcasts, interviews, or thought leadership).

Ability to balance speed (AI-assisted) with high-end creative judgment.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Strong time management and organizational skills.

Able to work Eastern Time hours (at least 6‚Äì8 hours overlap daily)

Hungry to learn and grow!! Our clients are brilliant so there is no shortage of ideas and takeaways from them and their shows.



Bonus (but not required)

Experience editing shorts/reels alongside long-form.

Familiarity with YouTube analytics and growth strategies

Knowledge of branding, design, or motion graphics.

Experience editing for B2B brands or professional services.



What we offer:

Competitive Monthly Pay: we are looking for the right person to work with us long-term. Pay will be competitive for the role as well as a lucrative bonuses in place for the team (That you can participate in) as well as bonuses individually

Full-time position with BONUS: This is a full-time position so we need this to be your biggest and primary priority from a work stand-point. Give us your best and we can work to give you bonuses along the way for helping the company hit our goals.

Flexible Schedule: Work remotely with autonomy, as long as you‚Äôre available during core Eastern Time Zone hours for meetings and calls.

Long-Term Growth: We are looking for a tea
mber who can grow with us and play an increasingly integral role in our day-to-day production dept.

Collaborative Team Culture: Work directly with our CEO and creative team, producing content for high-caliber clients.



About Us:

Podcast Your Brand is an industry-leading podcast agency helping B2B founders, attorneys, financial experts, and entrepreneurs create profitable podcasts that generate leads, build authority, and grow their businesses.



Our clients are proven, successful, high-trust leaders who care deeply about impact, content, and credibility.



We‚Äôre growing quickly, and we need a creative, detail-oriented video editor who can bring long-form podcast and thought leadership content to life, transforming raw footage into engaging videos optimized for YouTube and beyond.





Our Culture and Values:

At Podcast Your Brand, we believe in fostering a culture of excellence, accountability, and creativity. We align ourselves with the following principles:



The Four Agreements:

Be impeccable with your word.

Don‚Äôt take anything personally.

Don‚Äôt make assumptions.

Always do your best.



The Four Referability Habits:

Show up on time.

Do what you say.

Finish what you start.

Say please and thank you.



Core Values:

Take radical responsibility and be accountable.

Everything is figure-out-able.

Create wow factors and 
nts.

Do what it takes to win - for us and our clients.



How to Apply:

If you‚Äôre excited to use your editing skills and AI know-how to help entrepreneurs grow their authority through video, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!



To apply, please fill out this form:









We‚Äôll review all submissions and reach out to candidates selected for the next phase.



Best of luck!!

title: PPC Manager (Google & Bing Ads)
description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking an experienced PPC Manager to lead the development, execution, and optimization of paid search campaigns across both Google Ads and Bing Ads. The ideal candidate will have a hands-on understanding of both platforms and proven success managing large-scale, complex campaigns with significant budgets. You will be responsible for delivering results-driven campaigns that align with client goals while maintaining a deep understanding of industry best practices. Previous experience working at Google or a strong insider knowledge of Google Ads best practices is highly advantageous.

As a PPC Manager, you‚Äôll be the go-to expert for all things paid search and will have a direct impact on client performance. The role requires a strategic mindset, data-driven decision-making, and the ability to maintain clear and effective communication with both internal teams and clients.



Key Responsibilities:

1. Paid Search Strategy & Execution:

Campaign Development & Management: Develop, launch, and manage paid search campaigns on Google Ads and Bing Ads, ensuring they are aligned with client objectives and maximize ROI. This includes campaigns on Google Search, Display, YouTube, Shopping, and Bing Search.

Keyword Research & Audience Targeting: Conduct extensive keyword research, competitor analysis, and audience segmentation to identify growth opportunities. Develop comprehensive strategies based on these insights to optimize targeting and bidding.

Campaign Optimization: Continuously analyze and refine campaigns to improve performance metrics such as CPC, CTR, CPA, and ROAS. Implement A/B testing strategies for ad creatives, landing pages, and bidding strategies to maximize conversions.

Ad Copy & Creative Strategy: Work closely with the creative team to ensure that ad copy, creatives, and landing pages are optimized for user engagement and aligned with campaign goals.

2. Client Communication & Consultation:

Client Liaison: Serve as the main point of contact for clients, providing expert consultation on all Google Ads and Bing Ads strategies. Clearly communicate campaign progress, adjustments, and results to ensure client satisfaction and alignment with business objectives.

Performance Reporting: Regularly prepare and present in-depth performance reports, including key performance metrics (CPC, CTR, CPA, ROAS) and actionable insights. Use these reports to showcase campaign successes and provide strategic recommendations for optimization.

Strategic Guidance: Offer strategic recommendations to clients, advising on how to improve campaign performance, expand reach, or address performance challenges. Proactively identify opportunities for growth.

Client Relationship Management: Build and nurture strong relationships with clients, becoming a trusted advisor on paid search and digital marketing. Ensure high levels of client satisfaction, resolve campaign-related issues, and manage client expectations effectively.

3. Budget Management & Performance Tracking:

Budget Oversight: Manage and optimize client budgets across both Google Ads and Bing Ads to ensure campaigns are efficient and within budget. Track and report on budget pacing and ensure that client goals are met while maximizing ROI.

Performance Tracking & Analysis: Utilize Google Analytics, Microsoft Advertising Intelligence, Google Tag Manager, and other analytics platforms to monitor campaign performance in real time. Assess KPIs such as CPC, CTR, CPA, and ROAS to ensure campaigns are delivering results within the defined parameters.

Optimization: Make data-driven decisions to optimize campaigns for better performance. Adjust bids, keywords, targeting, and ads based on performance trends and competitive insights.

4. Collaboration & Cross-Functional Alignment:

Team Collaboration: Work closely with the broader digital marketing team (SEO, Social Media, Creative, Web Development) to ensure that PPC campaigns are integrated into wider marketing and sales strategies. Align campaigns with broader business objectives, ensuring a cohesive approach across all digital channels.

Stakeholder Coordination: Collaborate with internal stakeholders to ensure paid search efforts align with company goals and support sales or product launch strategies.

Knowledge Sharing: Actively contribute to knowledge-sharing within the marketing team by educating peers about PPC best practices, emerging trends, and new tools or features in Google Ads and Bing Ads.

5. Industry Trend Awareness & Innovation:

Stay Current with PPC Trends: Stay up-to-date with the latest Google Ads and Bing Ads updates, features, and best practices. Attend webinars, conferences, and industry events to keep ahead of emerging trends and leverage new opportunities for clients.

Test New Strategies: Continuously evaluate and experiment with new tools, bidding strategies, and ad formats to ensure campaigns are always optimized and competitive. Propose new strategies to clients based on these findings.

6. Reporting & Data-Driven Insights:

Regular Reporting: Create and maintain regular performance reports, dashboards, and presentations to track campaign progress, analyze performance trends, and showcase ROI. Present these findings in a clear, concise manner to clients and internal teams.

Actionable Insights: Translate complex data into actionable insights that drive campaign improvements. Provide clear, data-backed recommendations to both internal and client stakeholders to guide future PPC strategies and decisions.

Attribution & Conversion Tracking: Implement and manage proper tracking systems to measure campaign effectiveness and provide accurate reporting on conversions, revenue, and other key metrics.



Qualifications:

Education:

Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience). Certifications in Google Ads and Bing Ads are a plus.



Experience:

Proven PPC Experience: Minimum of 3‚Äì5 years of hands-on experience managing PPC campaigns across Google Ads and Bing Ads. This includes experience in Google Search, Display, YouTube, Shopping, and Bing Search campaigns.

Agency or Client Experience: Experience working in a client-facing role, ideally in a digital marketing agency, managing multiple PPC accounts with large-scale budgets.

Experience at Google (Bonus): Previous experience working at Google or within a Google Partner agency is highly desirable, particularly if you have in-depth knowledge of Google Ads best practices, new features, and insights from working directly with the platform.



Technical Skills:

Google Ads & Bing Ads Expertise: Advanced proficiency in managing campaigns across Google Ads and Bing Ads, including search, display, shopping, remarketing, and video campaigns.

Analytics Tools Proficiency: Strong working knowledge of Google Analytics, Microsoft Advertising Intelligence, Google Tag Manager, and other relevant analytics and tracking tools to measure, report, and optimize PPC campaign performance.

Data Interpretation: Ability to analyze large datasets, interpret complex data, and turn insights into actionable strategies to optimize campaign performance.



Soft Skills:

Excellent Communication & Presentation Skills: Ability to explain complex PPC strategies and performance data in a clear, concise, and accessible manner for clients, internal teams, and stakeholders.

Client Management Experience: Proven experience in building and nurturing strong client relationships. Ability to manage client expectations and resolve issues in a timely and professional manner.

Problem-Solving & Proactive Mindset: Strong problem-solving skills, with a proactive approach to identifying and addressing campaign issues. Ability to think critically and take strategic action based on data.

Attention to Detail: High attention to detail, ensuring that campaign elements are precise and accurately reflect client objectives, even when working with large volumes of data.



How to Apply:

If you‚Äôre an experienced PPC Manager looking for a new challenge, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, along with a cover letter outlining your relevant experience here. Include any specific campaigns or achievements that highlight your expertise with Google Ads and Bing Ads.

Lead Generation Specialist (Outbound)



Starlight Marketing | Remote

mber.

title: Order Issue Manager for Ecom Fashion Store
description:
Hey there!



We‚Äôre looking for an Order Issue Manager to join our Ecom Fashion Dropshipping Store.



We‚Äôre a fast-growing e-commerce company operating in the USA market.



This is one of the most important positions in our entire backend team.



You‚Äôll be responsible for identifying, fixing, and preventing every possible order-related issue that can occur ‚Äî from wrong sizes to supplier errors.



We‚Äôre building a long-term team of A-players who want to grow with us ‚Äî not just for a few weeks, but for the long run.



???? What We‚Äôre Looking For:



- Minimum 1 year of experience in e-commerce operations, quality control, or supply chain management.

- Proven experience working for a store doing $100K+ in monthly revenue.

- Strong communication skills to coordinate directly with suppliers, Customer Support, and the Supply Chain Manager.

- Excellent problem-solving mindset ‚Äî able to identify the cause of an issue and prevent it from happening again.

- Comfortable working with Spreadsheets / Google Sheets to track issues and improvements.

- High attention to detail and ownership ‚Äî you take full responsibility for product and order quality.

- Fluent in English for communication with the team and suppliers.

- Availability to work in the New-York timezone.



???? Your Main Tasks:



Solve and prevent all order-related issues, such as:



- Incorrect sizing or size charts.`

- Color or print mismatches.

- Missing or out-of-stock sizes.

- Products not matching descriptions or expectations.

- Perform quality checks for every product once it reaches a specific sales threshold to ensure long-term consistency.

- Work directly with suppliers to fix issues and communicate updates.

- Adjust product details (such as size charts, descriptions, or pricing) when issues are detected.

- Cooperate daily with the Customer Support team and Supply Chain Manager to ensure fast resolution and prevention of recurring problems.

- Negotiate better supplier prices when volume increases ‚Äî with a bonus system in place for successful price reductions.

- Keep detailed records of issues and improvements in spreadsheets for tracking and reporting.



???? What We Offer:



- Long-term position (we‚Äôre looking for someone to stay 6+ months minimum).

- Flexible working hours depending on performance and communication.

- Weekly or bi-weekly payouts (depending on agreement).

- Communication and task management via Slack.

- Growth opportunities within the team as we scale.

- Bonus structure based on issue prevention, quality improvements, and price negotiations.



???? What to Expect After You Apply:



If we think you‚Äôre a fit, we‚Äôll send you a short video explaining exactly how we work, what your daily tasks will look like, and what we expect from you.



After watching the video, you can respond with your thoughts ‚Äî and if it feels like a good match, we‚Äôll schedule a call to discuss the next steps.



?? Important

Only apply if:



- You‚Äôve read this entire post carefully.

- You meet all the requirements listed above.

- When you apply start with the word "ORDER ISSUE MANAGER 2026" so we know you have read the whole jobpost.

- You‚Äôre serious about joining a long-term team that values structure, precision, and proactive problem-solving.



If that‚Äôs you ‚Äî we can‚Äôt wait to meet you. ????

title: Dispatcher/ Parts Manager
description:

About the Company:

Speedy Mobile RV Repair is the premier mobile RV repair company in Florida offering comprehensive RV care, maintenance, and repair services. Locally owned and operated, we are RVTI-accredited and insured to perform anything from routine RV checkups to repair services.



Job Overview

The Service Call Dispatcher / Parts & Service Manager, ensuring efficient dispatching, accurate parts sourcing, timely scheduling, and quality-controlled service execution. This role acts as the operational link between customers, technicians, and internal teams, driving responsiveness, service accuracy, and customer satisfaction across all service calls.



Responsibilities:

*Service Dispatch & Coordination

- Receive and respond to inbound service requests. 

- Create, prioritize, and manage accurate work orders based on urgency and technician availability.

- Dispatch technicians efficiently and manage real-time communication throughout service calls.

- Schedule installations, repairs, and follow-up services to ensure timely completion.

- Participate in a rotating on-call schedule to support after-hours emergency service requests.



*Parts Management & Estimating

- Research, identify, and source RV parts using industry tools and supplier platforms.

- Create accurate service estimates, including labor and parts.

- Coordinate parts availability with scheduled installations and technician assignments.

- Ensure correct parts are ordered, documented, and aligned with service work orders.



*Customer Experience & Communication

- Serve as a primary point of contact for customers, providing clear updates and managing expectations.

- Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction through professional communication and follow-up.

- Support and oversee dispatcher workflows to ensure service consistency and accuracy.

- Maintain detailed service records and assist with reporting, tracking performance metrics, and job outcomes.

- Handle escalations with empathy and solution-focused decision-making.



Qualifications:

- 2+ years in service dispatch, fleet coordination, or a related field for a US company. (HVAC, automotive, marine, or RV industry experience preferred).

- Must be able to speak English without an accent and demonstrate strong verbal and written communication skills required to convey information.

- Experience with dispatching software (e.g., Housecall Pro) preferred.

- Experience with Go High Level CRM is preferred. 

- Knowledge of RV systems is a plus; willingness to learn is essential.

- Must have a reliable internet connection with a backup option and a quiet, distraction-free working environment.

- Must have prior experience working the night shift (8 am to 5 pm Eastern time)

title: Data Entry & Airtable Assistant
description:
Data Entry & Airtable Assistant (Design-Focused Project)



I‚Äôm building a curated database of design-led locations (architecture, galleries, public art, design showrooms, design hotels, etc.) I‚Äôm looking for a highly organised and detail-oriented assistant to help build and manage the backend database in Airtable.

Build and maintain an Airtable database

Input and clean structured data

Link related records (e.g. locations ? designers)

Keep categories and tags consistent

Ensure accuracy and avoid duplicates

Suggest simple workflow improvements where useful

Confirm official location name

Identify architect / designer (firm-level where possible)

Requirements

Excellent attention to detail

Comfortable doing structured online research

Clear communication and regular progress updates



Please share examples of Airtable work you‚Äôve done and confirm your availability and estimated timeline for completing 150 entries.

description:
We are actively seeking a highly creative Remote Animation & AI Video Specialist to produce engaging 2-minute educational animated videos. This role is ideal for someone who combines strong animation fundamentals with cutting-edge AI tools to create compelling, high-quality content efficiently.



You will be responsible for transforming scripts and concepts into visually captivating educational animations using modern animation software and AI-powered creative tools.



???? Key Responsibilities



Create high-quality 2-minute educational animated videos from script to final export.



Develop storyboards and visual concepts that align with brand and learning objectives.



Use AI tools to streamline animation, voiceovers, scripting support, and visual generation.



Design engaging characters, infographics, motion graphics, and transitions.



Edit and produce final videos with professional sound design and pacing.



Collaborate with the content and marketing teams to ensure educational clarity and engagement.



Optimise videos for various platforms (social media, website, YouTube, LinkedIn, etc.).



Maintain organised project workflows and meet tight deadlines.



???? Required Skills & Experience



Minimum 2 years of experience in animation and video production.



Proven experience creating short-form educational or explainer videos.



Strong skills in:



Adobe After Effects



Adobe Premiere Pro



Illustrator / Photoshop



Canva (bonus)



Experience with AI creative tools such as:



AI video generators



AI voiceover tools



AI image generators



Script-enhancement AI tools



Strong understanding of storytelling, pacing, and educational engagement.



Ability to create motion graphics, text animations, and whiteboard-style animations.



Excellent eye for design, typography, and visual hierarchy.



Strong file organisation and workflow management.



???? AI & Innovation (Highly Desired)



We are specifically looking for someone who:



Knows how to integrate AI into animation workflows to increase speed and quality.



Understands how companies can leverage AI for content scalability.



Stays up to date with emerging AI tools for animation and video production.



Can suggest process improvements using automation and AI.



???? Top Qualities



Highly creative with strong visual storytelling skills.



Energetic, proactive, and solution-oriented.



Excellent communication skills.



Calm under pressure and deadline-driven.



Strong organisational and time-management abilities.



Able to work independently while collaborating with a remote team.



Enjoys the fast-paced nature of a start-up environment.



???? Educational Background (Desired)



Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Animation, Graphic Design, Digital Design, Film, Multimedia, or related field.



Or graduate of a 2-year specialised course in animation or video production.



???? Working Hours



Must be available in the UK time zone:



8:00 a.m. ‚Äì 12:00 p.m. (mandatory)



3:00 p.m. ‚Äì 7:00 p.m. (offered once your timetable reaches capacity)



???? To Apply



Please fill out the online application here:


/webforms/
/
Attach your CV and portfolio showcasing animated educational videos (mandatory).

title: PART-TIME CUSTOMER SUPPORT & SOCIAL ENGAGEMENT SPECIALIST (E-COMMERCE)
description:
We are a growing DTC supplements e-commerce brand selling in the US market and are in the process of expanding into multiple stores. As part of this growth, we are looking for a Part-Time Customer Support & Social Engagement Specialist to help improve response coverage, consistency, and the overall customer experience.



This role is not just about replying to messages. It is for someone who understands customer support as a system and can help us become more structured as we scale.



RESPONSIBILITIES



- handling 
ments

- handling
 inbox messages

- handling instagram dms

- handling trustpilot reviews

- ensuring timely responses and that no customer messages are missed during coverage hours

- monitoring response coverage and following response time targets (slas)

- flagging missed messages, delays, or quality issues and stepping in when needed

- using existing response templates and suggesting improvements when needed

- tagging, organizing, and escalating issues appropriately

- working closely with our senior customer support specialist

- maintaining a consistent, friendly, and professional brand tone across all channels



REQUIREMENTS



- prior experience in e-commerce customer support

- experience working with supplements, health, or wellness brands is strongly preferred

- comfortable handling public comments and private inbox conversations

- strong written english and clear communication skills

- basic understanding of response time, coverage, and customer support metrics (slas, kpis)

- organized, detail-oriented, and reliable

- proactive mindset and able to work independently

- experience with shopify, helpdesk tools, or social inbox tools is a plus but not required



ROLE DETAILS



- part-time role with 20‚Äì25 hours per week to start

- flexible schedule with agreed coverage hours

- fully remote

- long-term opportunity as we expand into multiple brands

- as we grow, there will be opportunities to take on more responsibility for the right person



COMPENSATION



- hourly rate of $6‚Äì$8 depending on experience

- paid monthly



HOW TO APPLY

title: Experienced Cold Caller / Appointment Setter (AI Agency ‚Äì High Ticket B2B)
description:
We are a fast-growing AI automation agency operating in the UK market, specializing in advanced AI agents for businesses, including AI reception systems, automation workflows, and revenue-enhancing technology solutions.



We are looking for a highly professional, disciplined, and results-driven Cold Caller to help us reach decision-makers in the UK. Your primary responsibility will be outbound calling to aesthetic clinics and other service-based businesses, introducing our AI systems and booking qualified appointments for our sales team.



You must speak fluent, near-native English with a clear and neutral accent suitable for the UK (and later US) market. This role requires confidence, resilience, and the ability to handle objections professionally. You should be comfortable speaking with clinic owners, practice managers, and business decision-makers.



We work with GoHighLevel (GHL) as our CRM system, and you will receive structured scripts, onboarding, and clear KPIs. Your job is not to sell the full service but to spark interest, identify potential fit, and book appointments.



We are building long-term partnerships, not short-term hires. If you are consistent, reliable, and performance-oriented, there is strong potential for growth within the company.



Compensation includes a fixed salary (depending on experience and hours) with maybe also additional commission for booked appointments that convert into paying clients. High performers will always be rewarded.



We are looking for someone serious about performance, professional in communication, and comfortable operating in a high-tech, AI-driven environment.

title: Remote Resident Manager
description:
Remote Resident Manager ‚Äì $10/hr | Join a Fast-Growing Team!

Remote | Full-Time | Monday‚ÄìFriday, 7:30 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM EST



Watch the Role in Action! Want to see what this role looks like day-to-day?



Watch here: 



Fast-Track Your Application



Want to move straight to the interview stage? Complete our application form today, skip the line and go straight to interview consideration:







About Us



Bay Property Management Group (BMG) is one of the fastest-growing property management companies in the Mid-Atlantic region. With over 5,300 properties under management and $600M in assets, we‚Äôre committed to delivering exceptional service to property owners and tenants alike. Join our dynamic team of 140+ professionals and grow your career in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.



About the Role



We‚Äôre seeking a Remote Resident Manager to oversee a portfolio of 150‚Äì175 residential properties (single-family homes, townhomes, and condos). This is a client-facing, customer service-driven role that does not involve managing staff. You‚Äôll serve as the primary point of contact for tenants and property owners, ensuring smooth operations and prompt issue resolution.



What You‚Äôll Do:

-Manage daily operations for a portfolio of residential rental properties.

-Communicate effectively with tenants, property owners, contractors, and internal teams.

-Respond promptly to
s, voi
s, and service requests.

-Manage work orders in AppFolio; coordinate repairs with in-house techs and third-party vendors.

-Approve maintenance invoices and ensure services are completed properly and on time.

-Maintain low tenant delinquency and work within the owner‚Äôs budget.

-Oversee the turn process for vacant units, including cleaning and maintenance.

-Ensure compliance with local property codes and certifications (e.g., rental licenses, lead certs).

-Handle lease renewals, move-outs, and security deposit reimbursements.

-Keep detailed records and stay organized across multiple tasks and systems.



What We‚Äôre Looking For:

-High school diploma or equivalent

-Strong communication and exceptional customer service skills

-Ability to write professional
s and manage multiple tasks

-Basic knowledge of residential maintenance issues

-Proficiency in Microsoft Office (especially Outlook & Excel)

-Experience with AppFolio or other property management software

-Detail-oriented, organized, and a proactive problem solver

-Comfortable working independently in a fast-paced remote environment



Perks & Benefits:

-$10 USD/hour

-15 days of paid time off (PTO)

-100% remote work ‚Äî work from anywhere

-A supportive and friendly team environment

-Opportunities for growth and advancement within the company



Ready to take the next step in your career with a team that truly values your contributions and supports your growth?

title: Digital Marketing Manager (SEO & PPC)
description:
Remote (Philippines) | Full-Time | UK Agency



We are hiring an experienced Digital Marketing Manager with strong hands-on expertise in SEO and PPC to join our growing UK-based agency, Codesky.



This is not a junior role. We are looking for someone who understands strategy, execution, reporting, and commercial performance ‚Äî someone who can manage campaigns that directly impact real UK businesses.



You must have proven experience working with UK audiences.



About Codesky



Codesky is a UK-based web design and digital marketing agency. We work with service-based businesses across industries including construction, IT, renewable energy, professional services and ecommerce.



We focus on performance. Rankings that convert. Ads that generate measurable ROI. Reporting that clients actually understand.



We are process-driven, quality-focused, and performance-led.



Role Overview



You will be responsible for managing and improving:



‚Ä¢ SEO strategy and implementation

‚Ä¢ Google Ads and Microsoft Ads campaigns

‚Ä¢ Conversion optimisation

‚Ä¢ Analytics and reporting

‚Ä¢ Ongoing performance improvements



You will work directly with the agency director and internal team to manage multiple client accounts.



Core Responsibilities

SEO (Primary Focus)



‚Ä¢ Keyword research aligned to commercial search intent

‚Ä¢ Technical SEO audits and implementation guidance

‚Ä¢ On-page optimisation (metadata, structure, internal linking, schema where relevant)

‚Ä¢ Local SEO strategy (Google Business Profile optimisation, location pages, citations)

‚Ä¢ Link building strategy and execution

‚Ä¢ Competitor analysis

‚Ä¢ SEO roadmaps (3, 6, 12 month strategies)

‚Ä¢ Performance tracking via GA4, GSC and SEO tools

‚Ä¢ Delivering client-ready SEO reports with clear commentary



You must understand UK search behaviour and commercial intent.



PPC (Google Ads / Microsoft Ads)



‚Ä¢ Full campaign setup and restructuring

‚Ä¢ Search, Performance Max and remarketing campaigns

‚Ä¢ Conversion tracking setup (GA4, GTM preferred)

‚Ä¢ Budget management and bid strategy optimisation

‚Ä¢ A/B testing ads

‚Ä¢ Landing page performance feedback

‚Ä¢ Reducing CPA while improving lead quality

‚Ä¢ Monthly performance reporting



You must understand lead generation campaigns (not just ecommerce).



Required Skills & Experience



You must have:



‚Ä¢ 3+ years proven SEO experience

‚Ä¢ 2+ years hands-on Google Ads experience

‚Ä¢ Experience managing multiple accounts

‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of UK-based audiences

‚Ä¢ Experience using GA4

‚Ä¢ Experience using Google Search Console

‚Ä¢ Experience writing SEO-optimised content briefs

‚Ä¢ Strong analytical thinking

‚Ä¢ Confident written English (client-facing reporting level)



Preferred (Not Essential but Valuable):



‚Ä¢ Microsoft Ads experience

‚Ä¢ Experience with WordPress websites

‚Ä¢ Basic understanding of conversion rate optimisation

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with tools like SEMrush, Ahrefs or similar

‚Ä¢ Experience with call tracking tools



What This Role Is NOT



This is NOT:

‚Ä¢ A social media manager role

‚Ä¢ A Canva content posting role

‚Ä¢ A general VA role

‚Ä¢ A beginner marketing role



We want a performance-driven digital marketer who understands strategy, search intent, and commercial outcomes.



Working Structure



‚Ä¢ Full-time position

‚Ä¢ UK working hours (must have daily overlap)

‚Ä¢ Remote (Philippines-based applicants preferred)

‚Ä¢ Long-term role with growth opportunity



KPIs & Performance Expectations



You will be measured on:



‚Ä¢ SEO traffic growth (qualified traffic)

‚Ä¢ Ranking improvements for commercial keywords

‚Ä¢ PPC cost per conversion

‚Ä¢ Lead quality

‚Ä¢ ROI improvements

‚Ä¢ Accuracy and clarity of reporting

‚Ä¢ Proactive strategic input



We value results, not activity.



Personal Qualities We Value



‚Ä¢ Detail-oriented

‚Ä¢ Analytical

‚Ä¢ Commercially aware

‚Ä¢ Proactive (suggest improvements without being asked)

‚Ä¢ Process-driven

‚Ä¢ Calm under pressure

‚Ä¢ Honest and transparent



How to Apply



To apply, include:



A short introduction (not AI-generated)



Examples of SEO results you‚Äôve achieved (with metrics)



Examples of PPC campaigns you‚Äôve managed



Tools you use regularly



Why you believe you are suitable for this role

title: Media Buyer ($8-$11 USD)
description:
About the Role

We are a fast-growing, full-service agency with a tight-knit team of nine: four on the marketing side and five in SEO. We are looking for a dedicated Media Buyer who will work exclusively for our agency as a true tea
mber, not split across multiple companies.



This is a rare opportunity to own a critical function from day one, with a clear path to grow into a leadership role as the team expands. You will report directly to agency leadership and work closely with both the marketing and SEO divisions to drive measurable results.



What You‚Äôll Do

Plan, execute, and optimize paid media campaigns across platforms including Google Ads, Meta, LinkedIn, programmatic, and emerging channels.

Own the full media buying process, from strategy and audience targeting to creative testing, budget management, and performance reporting.

Collaborate with the marketing team to align paid media with organic strategy, SEO initiatives, and overall agency goals.

Analyze campaign data and turn insights into clear, actionable recommendations for internal stakeholders.

Monitor industry trends, platform updates, and the competitive landscape to identify new opportunities.

Manage and track media spend accurately, ensuring budgets are allocated efficiently and ROI is consistently maximized.

Build and maintain relationships with platform representatives to stay ahead of beta features and opportunities.



What We‚Äôre Looking For

Two to five years of hands-on paid media buying experience, either agency or in-house.

Proficiency with at least two major platforms such as Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager, LinkedIn Campaign Manager, DV360, or similar.

Strong analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make confident decisions.

Experience managing mid-to-large media budgets with proven performance results.

Comfort working in a lean, collaborative team where initiative is valued.

Solid understanding of the full digital marketing funnel and how paid media connects with SEO and content.

Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain media performance clearly to non-technical stakeholders.



Nice to Have

Experience working within or alongside a marketing team.

Familiarity with attribution modelling and multi-touch reporting.

Google Ads or Meta Blueprint certifications.

Experience with tools such as Google Analytics 4, Looker Studio, or similar reporting platforms.



What We Offer

A focused role where you work directly with our team, not spread thin across unrelated companies.

Competitive salary based on experience.

Clear growth path into a senior or leadership position as the agency scales.

Collaborative, no-ego team culture where ideas are heard and implemented.

Flexible working arrangements.

Direct access to agency leadership and a voice in shaping the media function.



Growth Opportunity

We are building a team where people grow with the company. As the agency expands, this role has a defined path toward Senior Media Buyer or Head of Paid Media. If you want to make a real impact instead of just executing tasks, this is the place to do it.

title: QA Test Engineer ‚Äì Automation & Development
description:
Ultra Labs is a dynamic U.S.-based business incubator and accelerator focused on building and scaling innovative software and technology-driven businesses. We are currently looking for an experienced QA Automation Engineer with strong automation and manual testing expertise to join our growing team and help ensure the quality of our products across multiple platforms.



Responsibilities

As a QA Automation Engineer, you will play a critical role in maintaining and improving the quality of our software products. 



Your responsibilities will include:

_Performing thorough regression, integration, and end-to-end testing.

_Designing, developing, and maintaining automated test frameworks and test scripts.

_Creating detailed test scenarios, test cases, and test plans based on functional and technical requirements.

_Executing both manual and automated tests to validate new features, bug fixes, and releases.

_Collaborating closely with developers, product owners, and other stakeholders to ensure high-quality deliverables.

_Identifying, documenting, and tracking defects using bug-tracking tools, and providing clear daily or sprint-based test reports.

_Continuously improving testing processes, tools, and best practices.

_Ensuring test coverage across web applications and deployed environments.



Qualifications

_4+ years of professional experience in QA, with hands-on experience in both manual and automation testing.

_Strong experience writing automated tests and scripts using Javascript.

_Solid understanding of the software development lifecycle (SDLC) and QA methodologies.

_Experience testing web applications.

_Hands-on experience with test automation tools and frameworks such as Cypress, Playwright, and/or Selenium.

_Familiarity with version control systems (GIT) and deployment processes.

_Experience using JIRA or similar issue-tracking tools.

_Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

_Excellent attention to detail and commitment to product quality.

_Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.

_Strong time management skills and ability to meet deadlines.

_Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.

_Open to feedback and continuous improvement.



How to Apply

If you‚Äôre passionate about quality, enjoy building reliable automation, and thrive in a collaborative environment, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration.

title: YouTube Operations Manager
description:
YouTube Operations Manager ‚Äî SOPs, KPIs, Systems & Team Execution



About us



We operate multiple faceless YouTube channels and we‚Äôre building a real machine behind it. We‚Äôre hiring an Operations Manager who thinks like an owner (intrapreneur), moves fast, and has non-negotiable standards.



This is not a role where you wait for instructions. You will bring structure, consistency, and accountability across the entire production pipeline.



Your responsibilities

 ‚Ä¢ Oversee the end-to-end workflow: topic ? script ? edit ? thumbnail ? upload ? QC

 ‚Ä¢ Document processes and create SOPs for recurring tasks (and make sure people follow them)

 ‚Ä¢ Track and improve KPIs (production + channel performance) with weekly reporting

 ‚Ä¢ Manage deadlines, follow up relentlessly, and eliminate blockers quickly

 ‚Ä¢ Run quality checks on scripts, edits, thumbnails, and uploads before publishing

 ‚Ä¢ Coordinate freelancers (writers, editors, thumbnail designers): feedback, consistency, performance

 ‚Ä¢ Keep everything organized in a tracker system (Drive + Trello/Sheets/Notion/ClickUp ‚Äî pick what works)



The type of person we want



You are:

 ‚Ä¢ A systems thinker (process > chaos)

 ‚Ä¢ High output and comfortable with hard work

 ‚Ä¢ Very detail-oriented and allergic to ‚Äúaverage‚Äù quality

 ‚Ä¢ Proactive and organized ‚Äî you don‚Äôt need hand-holding

 ‚Ä¢ Able to address underperformance directly (respectful, but firm)



Requirements

 ‚Ä¢ Proven experience managing workflows/teams (operations, agency work, production, PM, etc.)

 ‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of:

 ‚Ä¢ SOP creation + documentation

 ‚Ä¢ KPIs and tracking

 ‚Ä¢ Project tools like Drive/Trello/Sheets (Notion/ClickUp is a plus)

 ‚Ä¢ Strong English (written + spoken)

 ‚Ä¢ Reliable internet + responsive communication (daily updates)



Bonus points

 ‚Ä¢ Experience with YouTube automation / faceless channels

 ‚Ä¢ Managing creatives (writers/editors/designers)

 ‚Ä¢ Familiar with CTR, AVD, retention basics



Hours & commitment

 ‚Ä¢ Remote, long-term

 ‚Ä¢ High availability and fast response time during agreed hours

 ‚Ä¢ Daily progress updates are required



Pay



Pay depends on performance and the value you bring. You‚Äôll start at a level that covers your needs, and if you help us grow, compensation grows with it.



How to apply



Start your application with: OPS MACHINE



Include:

 1. Relevant experience + tools you‚Äôve worked with

 2. A short SOP example (or how you‚Äôd structure an SOP)

 3. Availability (hours/day + timezone)

 4. How you handle underperformers (brief but specific)



Hiring steps



Shortlisted candidates will complete:

 ‚Ä¢ IQ test

 ‚Ä¢ Speed test

 ‚Ä¢ Short interview + practical operations case

description:

 us your resume in PDF format only. Include all of the jobs you've worked at and the month + year. Do not leave anything off. Do not leave anything off.  us a 60-second video of yourself answering the following question:

What are the 3 most important things that the company you work for MUST do to show you that they care about you? For example, if they don‚Äôt give me these 3 things then that means they don‚Äôt care about me. The video CANNOT EXCEED 60 seconds, or you will automatically be disqualified.



3. IMPORTANT: Please
 the above two items to 
 to follow the above instructions will result in automatic disqualifications. Do not DM us or call us or contact us in any other way.



ABOUT OUR COMPANY:

Achieve Integrative Health is the #1 rated Acupuncture & Wellness Clinic in the United States with over 750 five star google reviews. Our Mission is to help people restore their body‚Äôs God given ability to heal itself so that they can do what they love. Our vision is to equip and inspire one million people around the world to do what they love, when they want, with whom they want. (
)



BENEFITS & COMPENSATION

* Competitive Total Compensation = $6-$12 USD/hr (base salary + bonuses)

* Unlimited Opportunities for Growth = as long as you can generate more results for the company we will never limit your ability to grow within our company. Every tea
mber can also become a partner of the business if they desire.

* Other Benefits for qualified tea
mbers = paid-time off, premiu
dical insurance, Employee Savings Matching Program

* Work from Home = no more 2-4 hour commutes to work

* Wellness Initiatives = benefit from complimentary virtual health services from our medical providers, ensuring your well-being and your family‚Äôs well-being is always a priority.

* everybody starts at $6 usd/hr during the first 3 months probation period.  The first 3 months we are testing your technical skills.

* After the first 3 months, your productions will be evaluated based on our standards of editing. We will rate your productions on a scale of 1 to 5. 5 is your productions are 100% in alignment with our standards of editing. 3 = your productions are 50% in alignment with our standards of editing. 1 = your productions are completely opposite of our standards of editing.

* a rating of 5 will result in your base salary increasing to $10/hr and you'll qualify to earn quarterly bonuses, giving you the potential to earn a total compensation of $15/hr.  (note: at this hourly rate, you will be required to produce 2x more than your first 3 months, more pay means more production requirements)

* a rating of 3 will result in no increase in base salary

* a rating of 1 will result in termination of employment



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Create and manage our shopify account to promote our e-commerce business

* Edit long form and short form videos daily for e-commerce and clinic and social media

* create & graphics for clinic projects and e-commerce business (eg t-shirt designs)

* you must have experience with Shopify and ecommerce sites

* must be able to edit videos & graphics quickly everyday

* must be highly organized as you will need to manage multiple tasks everyday



CHARACTER REQUIREMENTS:

‚Ä¢ You must truly have a caring heart and truly want to help people improve their health, if you are mainly focused on how much money you can make, we are not the team for you

‚Ä¢ You must be able to follow instructions exactly as written, if you don‚Äôt like reading or following instructions, we are not the right team for you

‚Ä¢ You must have a good heart. If you like to gossip behind peoples back, please don‚Äôt apply.

‚Ä¢ You must value Results over effort. If you like to be paid based on how many tasks you completed or how much responsibilities you have, we are not the team for you. We pay ONLY based on you meeting your KPIs, metrics, quotas.

‚Ä¢ You must be honest and have integrity. If you are caught lying, you will be immediately terminated.

‚Ä¢ You must want to EARN your pay (ie. base salary + bonuses) instead of being given a pay (ie. focused only on base salary) that you didn‚Äôt earn.



WORK SCHEDULE:

* Full-time = minimum of 40 hrs/wk.  You have the flexibility to choose your work hours, however, all tasks must be completed & submitted by 5am CST everyday M-F, and you required to attend our morning team huddles from 8:09am-8:45am cst M-F.



* Part-time = 20 hrs/wk. You have the flexibility to choose your work hours, however, all tasks must be completed & submitted by 5am CST everyday M-F, and you required to attend our morning team huddles from 8:09am-8:45am cst M-F.

title: US Tax Preparer & Bookkeeper
description:
Job Title: US Tax Preparer & Bookkeeper

Location: Remote

Job Type: Part-time

Starting Rate: $6.00/hour (Increase after 90-day performance review)



We are seeking a reliable, detail-oriented professional to join our growing team. If you have real experience with US tax preparation and QuickBooks bookkeeping and enjoy working in an organized, systems-driven environment, we encourage you to apply.



Overview

We are looking for a dedicated US Tax Preparer & Bookkeeper to support our accounting and tax operations. In this role, you will prepare individual and business tax returns, maintain accurate financial records, and help ensure clients‚Äô books are clean and tax-ready year-round.

This position is ideal for someone who is accurate, dependable, and proactive, with the ability to work independently and meet deadlines.



Job Details

As a US Tax Preparer & Bookkeeper, you will manage tax preparation and bookkeeping tasks for multiple clients, maintain organized documentation, and support efficient workflows. Your work will play a key role in ensuring compliance, accuracy, and a smooth tax process for our clients.



What You‚Äôll Be Doing

Tax Preparation & Compliance

Prepare Individual Tax Returns (Form 1040) and related schedules

Prepare Business Tax Returns (1120, 1120S, 1065)

Handle State and Franchise Tax filings

Review financial records to ensure accuracy and tax readiness

Identify missing information and communicate with the team as needed

Maintain organized digital tax workpapers and documentation



Bookkeeping & Financial Management

Perform bookkeeping using QuickBooks Online

Categorize transactions accurately

Reconcile bank and credit card accounts

Clean up and correct incomplete or messy books when necessary

Prepare monthly financial reports (Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet)

Ensure books remain accurate and ready for tax filing



Data Entry & Administrative Support

Perform accurate data entry and document management

Upload and organize client files using consistent naming and folder structures

Track tasks and meet internal deadlines

Assist with administrative support related to tax and accounting operations



Systems & Process Improvement

Follow and help improve internal workflows and checklists

Create SOPs and process documentation when needed

Identify opportunities to improve efficiency or reduce errors



What You Bring to the Role

Proven experience preparing US individual and business tax returns

Experience with QuickBooks Online

Experience with TaxSlayer or similar US tax software

Strong attention to detail and accuracy

Excellent time management and organizational skills

Ability to work independently and meet deadlines



Preferred Qualifications

Experience handling Franchise Taxes

Previous experience working with a US accounting or tax firm



What You Can Expect

Starting rate of $6.00/hour

Performance review after 90 days with opportunity for a pay increase

Long-term position with growth potential

Stable workload and supportive team environment

Opportunity to expand responsibilities based on performance



About the Company

We are a growing accounting and tax services company focused on providing accurate, reliable, and efficient support to our clients. Our goal is to build a strong remote team that values integrity, accountability, and continuous improvement. We believe in long-term relationships and creating opportunities for team members to grow with the company.

If you have real US tax preparation experience and are looking for a long-term remote opportunity, we encourage you to apply.

title: Creator Scount

title: Technical SEO & Ecommerce Performance Analyst
description:
We are seeking a highly analytical, technically skilled SEO and performance specialist to improve organic visibility, site performance, and conversion rates across multiple Shopify stores.



This role is NOT focused on content writing or blogging. Instead, the ideal candidate understands how search engines, search apps such as Searchspring, ecommerce platforms (Shopify), and real user behavior interact ‚Äî and can identify why traffic isn‚Äôt converting and what to fix.



You will be responsible for monitoring site health, Core Web Vitals, organic search performance, and on-site behavior, then recommending and prioritizing changes that drive measurable growth.



Key Responsibilities

- Technical SEO & Site Health

- Monitor and troubleshoot Core Web Vitals (LCP, INP, CLS)

- Identify performance issues related to:

-- Theme code

-- JavaScript bloat

-- Third-party apps

-- Image delivery

-- Caching and CDN configuration

- Recommend actionable fixes for developers or implement directly when possible

- Monitor crawlability, indexing, canonicalization, and sitemap health

- Identify redirect chains, duplicate content, and indexation waste

- Organic Search Optimization

- Monitor organic rankings and search visibility across all stores

- Monitor AI visibility across all stores

- Identify opportunities to improve:

-- Collection structure

-- Internal linking

-- Faceted navigation handling

-- Category hierarchy

- Review Google Search Console data to:

-- Identify declining pages

-- Find missed keyword opportunities

-- Diagnose indexing or coverage issues

- Recommend new collections or landing pages based on search demand

- Keyword & Traffic Analysis

- Analyze organic search queries and landing page performance

- Identify:

-- High-impression / low-CTR opportunities

-- High-traffic / low-conversion pages

-- Keywords we rank for but are not capitalizing on

- Recommend keyword targeting strategies aligned with:

-- Product categories

-- Collection pages

-- High-value SKUs

- Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)

- Review onsite behavior to identify conversion issues

- Analyze:

-- Product page layouts

-- Collection filtering and navigation

-- On-site search behavior

-- Mobile vs desktop gaps

- Recommend UX, merchandising, or layout changes to improve conversion

- Connect traffic intent to landing page relevance



REQUIRED Skills

- Strong understanding of technical SEO

- Deep knowledge of Google Search Console

- Experience with Core Web Vitals optimization

- Strong analytical skills 

- Solid understanding of Shopify architecture, including:

-- Collections

-- Tags

-- Templates

- Ability to diagnose problems without relying on content creation



Preferred Experience

- Ecommerce SEO experience (large catalogs strongly preferred)

- Shopify Plus experience

- SearchSpring experience

- Experience working with:

-- GA4

-- Google Search Console

-- Lighthouse

-- PageSpeed Insights

-- Screaming Frog or similar tools

- Familiarity with:

-- Faceted navigation SEO

-- Canonical strategy

-- Crawl budget optimization

- CRO or UX analysis background a plus



Qualified applicants will be given an assignment prior to interviewing. When applying, put "CRO Enthusiast" in your Subject line.

title: Lead Customer Support & Support Systems Specialist (Richpanel / Gorgias-Style Platform)
description:
Job Title

Lead Customer Support & Support Systems Specialist (Richpanel / Gorgias-Style Platform)



About Us

All Angles Creatures is a fast-growing U.S.-based e-commerce company specializing in live feeder insects, bioactive supplies, and reptile care products. We ship nationwide, operate at high daily order volume, and care deeply about customer experience, accuracy, and reliability.

This is not a basic customer support role. We‚Äôre looking for someone who enjoys owning systems, improving workflows, and being the go-to person for how support is run‚Äîwhile still actively helping customers every day.



The Role

This is a hybrid role:

 ‚Ä¢ You will lead and own our customer support software (Richpanel)

 ‚Ä¢ You will handle customer support tickets daily

 ‚Ä¢ You will help improve workflows, automations, tagging, macros, and reporting

Think of this as Customer Support Lead + Systems Operator, not a manager with no hands-on work.



What You‚Äôll Be Responsible For

Customer Support (Daily Work)

 ‚Ä¢ Respond to customer inquiries via
, chat, and order-related tickets

 ‚Ä¢ Handle shipping questions, order changes, delays, and general product questions

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain a calm, professional, and friendly tone at all times

 ‚Ä¢ Accurately document and tag tickets for reporting and follow-up

Support Platform Ownership (Richpanel)

 ‚Ä¢ Be the primary owner of Richpanel for our team

 ‚Ä¢ Set up and maintain:

 ‚Ä¢ Ticket views

 ‚Ä¢ Tags and categories

 ‚Ä¢ Macros / canned responses

 ‚Ä¢ Automations and workflows

 ‚Ä¢ Identify inefficiencies and suggest improvements

 ‚Ä¢ Help train other support reps on best practices inside the platform

 ‚Ä¢ Ensure tickets don‚Äôt fall through the cracks

(If you‚Äôve used Gorgias, Zendesk, Freshdesk, or similar tools, the skills transfer directly.)



Required Skills & Experience

You are a strong fit if you:

 ‚Ä¢ Are very comfortable with software tools

 ‚Ä¢ Have worked inside ticket-based customer support platforms

 ‚Ä¢ Understand how workflows, tags, and automation improve speed and accuracy

 ‚Ä¢ Can troubleshoot issues without panic

 ‚Ä¢ Are organized, detail-oriented, and proactive

 ‚Ä¢ Write clear, professional English

 ‚Ä¢ Can switch between ‚Äúsystems thinking‚Äù and direct customer help easily



Strongly Preferred (Big Plus)

 ‚Ä¢ Experience with Richpanel or Gorgias

 ‚Ä¢ Experience supporting e-commerce customers

 ‚Ä¢ Experience working with U.S.-based companies

 ‚Ä¢ Experience training or guiding other support agents

 ‚Ä¢ Experience creating SOPs or internal documentation



What This Role Is NOT

 ‚Ä¢ Not a call center job

 ‚Ä¢ Not a passive ‚Äújust answer tickets‚Äù role

 ‚Ä¢ Not a micromanaged position

We want someone who takes ownership, notices problems before they become issues, and helps improve the system over time.



Work Schedule

 ‚Ä¢ Full-time

 ‚Ä¢ U.S. business hours overlap required

 ‚Ä¢ Long-term role with growth potential



How to Apply (IMPORTANT)

To apply, please include:

A short introduction about your customer support experience

The support tools you‚Äôve worked with (please be specific)

One example of how you improved a support workflow or system in a past role

Applications without these details may not be reviewed.



Why This Role Matters

Customer support is a core part of our brand. The person in this role will directly shape how customers experience our company and how smoothly our internal systems run.

If you like being trusted, relied on, and central to operations, this role is for you.

title: Shopify CRO / D2C Growth Manager
description:
Position: Shopify CRO / D2C Growth Manager 



Department: Marketing & D2C 

Location: Philippines

Shift Timings: EST Time Zone with Time Tracker



About CBAYEXPRESS / Herbishh 

CBAYEXPRESS CORPORATION is a Canadian-based e-commerce company with multi-market presence across Amazon, Walmart, Shopify, eBay, and international marketplaces. Our flagship brand Herbishh specializes in hair care and personal care, scaling rapidly across global channels. 



We are now building a dedicated D2C team to grow Shopify into a major revenue channel. 



Role Overview 

The Shopify CRO / D2C Growth Manager will own the Shopify channel growth, focusing on conversion rate optimization (CRO), AOV growth, retention, and customer lifetime value. This person will act as the bridge between marketing, creative, and customer experience to maximize the performance of our D2C stores. 



Key Responsibilities 

1. Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) 

‚Ä¢ Audit our website - Herbishh and future brand sites. 

‚Ä¢ Run A/B tests across PDPs, landing pages, cart, and checkout. 

‚Ä¢ Optimize UX, speed, and mobile-first experience. 

‚Ä¢ Implement upsell, cross-sell, and bundle strategies. 



2. D2C Sales Growth 

‚Ä¢ Own the Shopify P&L (traffic/conversion/retention). 

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with Dhruvi (Head of Marketing) on paid media alignment. 

‚Ä¢ Ensure all ad-driven traffic lands on CRO-optimized pages. 



3. Customer Journey & Retention 

‚Ä¢ Work with
/CRM Manager to improve flows (welcome, post-purchase, win-back, subscription). 

‚Ä¢ Increase AOV (bundles, upsells) and LTV (subscriptions, loyalty programs). 

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with Marketing Manager for omnichannel integration. 



4. Data & Analytics 

‚Ä¢ Monitor KPIs: conversion rate, AOV, LTV, CAC. 

‚Ä¢ Use attribution & analytics tools (GA4, Triple Whale, Northbeam). 

‚Ä¢ Build weekly D2C performance dashboards for leadership. 



5. Collaboration & Execution 

‚Ä¢ Coordinate with creative team for CRO-focused assets (infographics, landing pages). 

‚Ä¢ Gather customer insights from Customer Success team for CRO experiments. 

‚Ä¢ Partner with inventory & product teams to align D2C launches with Amazon. 



Requirements 

‚Ä¢ 3‚Äì5 years in Shopify CRO / D2C growth role. 

‚Ä¢ Proven track record of increasing conversion rates & AOV. 

‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with CRO tools (Hotjar, VWO, Google Optimize, Optimizely). 

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Shopify apps (Rebuy, Bold Bundles, Zipify, Recharge). 

‚Ä¢ Strong analytical skills (GA4, Triple Whale, Looker, or similar). 

‚Ä¢ Excellent communication & project management skills. 



Nice-to-Have 

‚Ä¢ Experience with beauty/personal care brands. 

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Meta, Google, TikTok Ads funnel optimization. 

‚Ä¢ Exposure to subscription/retention growth strategies. 



What We Offer:

‚Ä¢ Competitive salary (depending on experience). 

‚Ä¢ Direct exposure to leadership & decision-making. 

‚Ä¢ Opportunity to shape analytics foundation of a global brand. 

‚Ä¢ Growth path into Head of Analytics / Business Intelligence Director role. 

‚Ä¢ Collaborative remote-first culture with global teams (India, PH, Canada, Mexico).
